posts.title: The Darts 2024
posts.body:
The Darts vender tilbage til Loppen den 1. september og giver dig din årlige dosis garagerock på en (u)hellig søndag!
The Darts blev dannet i 2016 med målet om at danne et all-female band, se hele verden og holde en fed pyjamasfest hver aften - med bundsolid garagerock som soundtrack.
De fire kvinder fik hurtigt udgivet to selvproducerede EP'er, hvorefter de blev signet på britiske
Dirty Water Records
. I løbet af et lille år havde The Darts altså formået at få sig en pladekontrakt og afsluttede med hæsblæsende fart 2017 med udgivelsen af debutalbummet
Me.Ow
, der har fået stor ros af både den amerikanske og europæiske musikpresse. Siden da har The Darts turneret verden tynd med The Living End, Billie Joel Armstrongs (Green Day) band The Longshot og ikke mindst - The Darts personlige helte - The Damned.
Da Jello Biafra signede bandet til sit pladeselskab
Alternative Tentacles
i 2018, udgav The Darts deres tredje album
I Like You But Not Like That
, hvorfra den smukke og skramlede single "Love You To Death" blev en del af soundtracket til tv-serien Peaky Blinders.
"A true garage-rock tornado ... furious live energy ... enormous production with unstoppable bursts of psych-punk to get even the most apathetic of nerds moshing. Crank it!"
-
Rolling Stone (FR)
End ikke pandemien kunne sætte en kæp i hjulet for The Darts. Selvom nedlukningen ramte Phoenix-kvartetten på det punkt i deres karriere, hvor den med lethed kunne have saboteret gruppens stride strøm af medvind, formåede kvartetten at forblive relevante. The Darts var blandt andet forbi det legendariske KEXP-studie og formåede at crowd-funde sig frem til finansiering af deres fjerde album,
Snake Oil
(2022), der sendte bandet direkte tilbage på de internationale landeveje - og også forbi Loppen i september 2023.
Et lille år senre byder vi nu på et gensyn med The Darts den 1. september, hvor kvartetten kan diske op med helt friske numre fra deres nyeste skive
Boomerang
, der udkommer den 26. april. Boomerang blev skrevet under Snake Oil tournéen og er produceret af den legendariske Mark Rains i Station House Studio. 13 nye tracks af rå, hårdslående og fængslende garage-psych-rock er i hvert fald klar fra The Darts til dig, når de igen rammer København!
TILFØJ TIL KALENDER

posts.title: Maustetytöt
posts.body:
Maustetytöt - direkte oversat fra finsk til 'Spice Girls' - bevægede sig for alvor ud af Findlands mørke skove, da de medvirkede i den Cannes-prisvindende film 'Fallen Leaves'. Nu kommer skandinaviens mest upbeat pop-duo med de mest triste tekster til Loppen søndag den 8. september!
Søsterduoen Maustetytöt har for længst opnået kultstatus i hjemlandet Finland. Kaisa og Anna Karjalainens catchy og dystre pop kom dog for alvor ud fra de finske skoves mørke, da de medvirkede i den legendariske instruktør Aki Kaurismäkis Cannes-nomirede og prisvindende mørke komedie
Fallen Leaves
.
Hvis man lytte til Maustetytöts musik, kan det heller ikke undre nogen at de er endt i en mørk komedie. Duoens indie-pop er en uimodståelig kombination af fængslende melodier og hyperrealistiske tekster, som enhver med bare den mindste hang til sortsind og pessimisme kan relatere til. De upbeat pop-baskere bliver ligeledes leveret med en lakonisk attitude og tør humor live, hvor søstrene ofte performer med deres jernblik nonchalant gemt bag solbriller.
Maustetytöts debutsingle "Tein kailottorivini väärin" udkom i 2019 og blev med det samme et hit med over 10 millioner streams på Spotify. Siden da har duoen ufgivet 3 albums, der igen og igen ender på toppen af de finske hitlister.
Kom og få din dosis solskinspop tilsat riglige mængder ærkeskandinavisk pessimisme og tristesse på Loppen søndag den 8. september!
TILFØJ TIL KALENDER

posts.title: Alex Warren
posts.body:
Amerikanske Alex Warren har på bemærkelsesværdig vis fået vendt personlige tragedier til musik med millioner af streams og en karriere på TikTok. Kom og hør singer-songwriteren hylde livet og kærligheden på Loppen den 13. september!
Med en placering på PEOPLEs liste over “Talented Emerging Artists Making Their Mark,” har Alex Warren formået at vende op og ned på sit liv. På få år er det amerikanske stjerneskud gået fra at leve som hjemløs i venners biler til at have en følgerskare på 26 millioner på sociale medier. Alex Warrens vej op fra L.A.s gader startede med uskyldige TikToks med kæresten på bagsædet af en bil, der voksede sig til en gedigen levevej som influencer og komiker på Youtube.
Musikken har dog altid været Warrens passion, men noget han længe har holdt længe på, før han introducerede sit publikum til hans sange. Warrens dybt personlige fortællinger har dog ræsonneret med mennesker verden over, og i dag deler Warren glædeligt alle sine fortællinger om sorg, håb og kærlighed fra et prøvelsesfyldt liv. Lige fra hans gennembrud med singlen “Before You Leave”, som er en hyldest til hans nuværende forlovede, til hans seneste single “Save You A Seat”, der sender kærlige tanker til Warrens afdøde forældre - Alex Warren lykkes altid med at røre hjertet hos enhver lytter.
Kom og være vidne til en realisering af den amerikanske drøm, når Alex Warren gæster Loppen den 13. september!
TILFØJ TIL KALENDER

posts.title: The Mukherjee Development
posts.body:
Loppen byder på en sand musikalsk lykkepille, når ambassadørerne for solskin og håndspillet musik, The Mukherjee Development, giver koncert den 14. september! Kvintetten er ikke selv meget for at blive sat i en genrekasse, men skal man løfte sløret lidt for bandets soniske univers, har vi nok at gøre med kvalitetsbevidst indie-rock tilsat en smule psych og rigelige mængder musikalsk virtousitet.
Tom Petty møder Coldplay. Intens og insisterende energi møder dyb balance. Nogle af landets måske dygtigste musikere mødes, åndehullerne opstår, og tanken er fri. Dér har du TheMukherjee Development.
Du kan opleve bandets svævende og melodiske tag på syrerocken på bandets nyeste album ’Should I Dance For You?’, som allerede flyver nu. Det er efterfølgeren til det roste album Burnin’ Time, som blev flittigt spillet på radioen.
For bandet, der–udover dansk/amerikanske/indiske frontmand, Oscar Mukherjee, bl.a. består af sværvægtere fra Peter Sommer & Tiggerne og Jonah Blacksmith, er 'Should I Dance For You?' den nemme to’er. For det var hele præmissen for albummet. "Ro på", sagde kvintetten til hinanden.
"Vi helliger processen. Vi vil skabe et sprog sammen – og sammen med vores publikum. Vi er venner, har været i branchen i mange år, alting går så stærkt,og lige her, hvor vi er, skriver vi vedkommende sange i en travl tidsalder. Sange, folk har brug for. Vi har lyst til at ruste folk til at huske at være kreative midt i et lidt for højt tempo. Vi vil skrive os ind i fællesskabet, for det er dét, det hele handler om"
, fortæller Oscar Mukherjee.
Mukherjee er ham, der skriver ordene og sangene i samarbejde med ’kollektivet’ – bandet. Og hvis du spørger dem selv, har de ikke travlt. De holder fast i kernen, tager de skarpe sving, hvis de har lyst, vil ikke genrebestemmes, og er en slags ambassadører for solskin og musik, du ikke finder mere velspillet på den danskemusikscene.
Få din dosis af septembersolskin og håndlavet musik den 14. september på Loppen!
TILFØJ TIL KALENDER
Lørdag 14. sep 2024

posts.title: Amanda Bergman
posts.body:
Bad dig i blid og inderlig singer-songwriting, når Amanda Bergman kommer til Loppen den 15. september 2024!
Den svenske singer-songwriter Amanda Bergman er ikke nødvendigvis en nyhed på scenen, hendes hæse og varme stemme har rørt og fortryllet mennesker verden over gennem mere end 10 år. Det hele begyndte under det mystiske pseudonym Hajen and Idiot Wind, der senere udviklede sig til en karriere som forsanger for supergruppen Amason, som også talte andre prominente svenske musikere fra blandt andet Dungen og Miike Snow.
Bergmans solokarriere fik luft under vingerne i 2016 med udgivelsen af debutpladen
Docks
, der er blevet rost af anmeldere og musikere verden over, herunder Bergmans personlige idol Justin Vernon, forsangeren i Bon Iver. Selvom der har været otte års stilhed fra soloprojektet, har Bergman ikke spildt tiden med at fange pusten igen. Der er blevet købt en gård i Sverige, udgivet album med Amason, vundet adskillige musikpriser samt startet et nyt koncertsted, "Rockbonden".
De sidste otte år har personlig modgang og problemer med mentalt helbred også præget Bergmans liv. Modgang og livets store spørgsmål er derfor også temaet på Bergmans andet soloudspil,
Your Hand Forever Checking On My Fever
, der udgives den 7. juni på Bergmans eget pladeselskab CowCow.
Kom med til en dyb, inderlig og ærlig aften med en af Sveriges mest toneangivende singersong-writer stemmer den 15. september 2024 på Loppen!
TILFØJ TIL KALENDER

posts.title: GIRL & GIRL
posts.body:
Efter successen med 2023's EP-udgivelse 'Divorce', har den australske indierockkvartet signeret med legendariske Sub Pop, og står i dag klar med udgivelsen af debutalbummet 'Call a Doctor'. Gør dig klar til jingle, jangle og en masse tidløs indietwang, når Girl and Girl spiller live på Loppen d. 18. september!
Sub Pops seneste tilføjelse til galleriet er Girl and Girl, startet af forsanger/sangskriver Kai James og hans tante Liss på trommer, der bakkes op af Jayden Williams på guitar og Fraser Bell på bas. Garagerock-kvartetten fra Queensland, Australien har et slægtskab, der skinner igennem i deres musik og i deres elektriske liveshows.
Girl and Girl blev kåret som en af TheMusic.com.au's 'Top 25 Rising Acts of 2021' og vandt året efter den indledende Gold Coast Music Prize i 2022. Herefter drog bandet på landevejen som support for engelske Dry Cleaning, før de begav sig ud på en europæisk debutturné, der blandt andet inkluderede showcase-optrædener på The Great Escape, supportdatoer med Blondshell og en optræden på Londons überhippe Wide Awake Festival.
I 2023 annoncerede bandet deres kontrakt med Sub Pop og genudgav deres ’Divorce’ EP, hvilket vandt fans hos musikmedierne Brooklyn Vegan, DIY Magazine og BBC6 Music.
Nu er Girl and Girls første fuldlængdealbum ’Call a Doctor’ endelig klar! Pladen er indspillet i Melbourne med Burke Reid bag knapperne, som tidligere har arbejdet med artister som Courtney Barnett og Julia Jacklin. ’Call a Doctor’ står til at udkomme i dag d. 24. maj -  lige i tide til, at du kan lære alle sangene i sommerferien, så du er klar til bandets indtagelse af Loppen til september!
TILFØJ TIL KALENDER

posts.title: Bodega
posts.body:
Nogle gange skal man bevæge sig baglæns for at komme fremad. Spørg bare New York art-punkerne i Bodega, hvis nye album
Our Brand Could Be Yr Life
præsenterer gamle sange i nye klæder og viser en ny musikalsk side af bandet. Glæd dig til en blanding af dancepunk, slackerrock og en snert af R.E.M (?), når Bodega rammer Loppen til september.
Siden Bodegas dannelse i 2016 har frontpersoner Ben Hozie og Nikki Belfiglio (som tidligere har spillet sammen i bandet BODEGA BAY) haft en karriere i kometfart. Bandets debutplade ’Endless Scroll’ fra 2018 udkom til stor kritikerros, mens duoen ved siden af musik også fungerede som filmskabere. De vandt stor anerkendelse for deres erotiske drama ’PVT Chat’ i 2020 med Peter Vack, Julia Fox og andre genkendelige ansigter fra Safdie Brothers filmiske univers i hovedrollerne.
Nu er gruppen - som også tæller trommeslager Adam Shumski, bassist Adam See og guitarist Dan Ryan - klar med tredje udgivelse
Our Brand Could Be Yr Life
; et konceptalbum om den profitfokuserede undergrunds-indierockscene og -ungdomskultur, der både kritiserer og fejrer, i håb om at forløse indie-scenens ‘fald fra nåde’.
Our Brand Could Be Yr Life
er en tur igennem indierock-undergenrer som dancepunk, shoegaze, slackerrock, psykedelisk rock og en snert af R.E.M, og ifølge bandet selv, er det deres bedstlydende plade til dato.
Sangende på albummet blev oprindeligt skrevet for otte år siden, hvor gruppen indspillede sangene lo-fi med kun én mikrofon på en mac-computer. Nu har Bodega omfortolket
Our Brand Could Be Yr Life
til år 2024, og bringer de gamle sange ind i moderne tid med stærkt omarbejdede arrangementer, der understreger, hvor meget Bodega er vokset musikalsk. Du står tilbage med en musikalsk tidskapsel af, hvem Bodega var, og hvem de snart er.
TILFØJ TIL KALENDER
Fredag 20. sep 2024

posts.title: J Bernardt
posts.body:
Den musikalske altmuligmand J. Bernardt gæster Loppen den 29. september! Den musikalske charmør er kendt fra Balthazar, men nu er han klar med sit andet album 'Contigo' - en voldsomt romantisk break-up plade. Kom og få dit fix af alternativ pop med snuskede grooves.
J. Bernardt, også kendt som Jinte Deprez, er noget af en altmuligmand; sanger, sangskriver, instrumentalist, producer, ingeniør, programmør. Mens debutalbummet 'Running Days' er blanding af lyd formet af elektronik, er det nye album Contigo indspillet med et gammeldags band – nemlig en gruppe af Deprez's "super-talentfulde" venner, som han guidede gennem intense prøver og optrædener, "på jagt efter den helt rigtige gnist."
Contigo – spansk for "med dig" – er et dramatisk, fængslende og farverigt værk, gennemsyret af drama og bragt til live af overdådige melodier, vokaler og produktionsdetaljer fra en mesterstudieauteur, musikalsk innovatør og sanger. Contigo udforsker alle faser af et brud: chok, tristhed, vrede, benægtelse, smerte, accept... og rammer 'voldsomt romantisk' i processen.
Deprez er bedst kendt som den ene halvdel af sangskriverduoen i Balthazar, et af Belgiens mest elskede og respekterede alternative rockbands i over to årtier, samt for det alternative rock-projekt Warhaus.
Solo udforsker han dog alt fra rock til R'n'B og soul, så gør dig klar på at blive charmeret af nogle snuskede grooves på Loppen den 29. september.
Billetsakget starter den 6. juni kl.10:00.
TILFØJ TIL KALENDER

posts.title: The Headhunters
posts.body:
Legendariske The Headhunters vender tilbage til Loppen den 10. oktober! Bandet, der blev dannet af Herbie Hancock, spillede sidste år en udsolgt koncert på Loppen som led i deres 50 års jubilæumstour, der står tilbage som en af de mest mindeværdige efterårsaftener på Loppen i 2023. Kom og (gen)oplev en magisk aften med The Headhunters tidløse musikalske arv!
"Remarkably masterful, fresh-sounding, and creatively restless...For over 50 years, The Headhunters have continually reinvented themselves.” - ALL MUSIC
Få bands kan bryste sig af en så imponerende, overraskende og lang historie som The Headhunters. Det hele startede tilbage i 1973, da den ikoniske musiker Herbie Hancock dannede Headhunters med Bennie Maupin (saxofon og klarinet), Paul Jackson Jr. (bas), Harvey Mason (trommer) og Bill Summers (percussion).
Tilsammen står de bag en fuldstændigt tidløs, musikalsk arv, som de fleste bands kun kan drømme om. Deres unikke blanding af jazz, funk og rock nåede ud til millioner af fans, og med over en million solgte albums kom bandets arv til at inspirere og påvirke musikere i alle genrer helt frem til den dag i dag - og så er deres musik i øvrigt også blevet samplet af utallige kunstnere indenfor hip hop i 80'erne og 90'erne som f.eks. Madlib, J Dilla, Gang Starr og De La Soul.
The Headhunters' indflydelse er stadig et globalt fænomen, og deres tid med Hancock viste sig at være en livsforandrende oplevelse. Foruden deres selvbetitlede debutalbum har The Headhunters udgivet yderligere seks fuldlængde album, herunder Thrust i 1974 med tilføjelse af trommeslageren Mike Clark. I 1975 gik de på egen hånd - uden Hancocks medvirken - med albummet Survival of the Fittest, der kort efter blev fulgt op af Straight from the Gate i 1977.
Efter tyve års pause blev The Headhunters genforenet med Herbie Hancock på Verve-albummet Return of the Headhunters fra 1998, hvorefter Clark, Jackson og Summers turnerede aktivt, indtil at vi mistede Jackson i marts 2021. Udover de oprindelige medlemmer Clark og Summers består bandet nu af Chris Severin på bas, Donald Harrison på saxofon og Kyle Roussel på klaver.
I 2022 udgav The Headhunters deres tiende album Speakers In The House, hvor jazz-pionererne igen beviste, hvorfor de fortsat er relevante 50 år efter bandets dannelse. I efteråret 2023 tog The Headhunters på en omfattende tour for at fejre 50-års jubilæum, der også kom forbi Loppen til hvad, der endte med at være en af efterårets mest mindeværdige koncerter. Hvis noget er godt, er der ikke nogen grund til at stoppe med at gøre det, så kom og (gen)oplev The Headhunters på Loppen!
TILFØJ TIL KALENDER
Torsdag 10. okt 2024

posts.title: Hjalte Ross
posts.body:
Oplev en dansk sangskriver i verdensklasse, når Hjalte Ross indtager Loppen med nærvær og intensitet den 11. oktober!
I efteråret 2023 udkom Hjalte Ross med sit nyeste album ’Less’. Han beskriver det som værende sin mest direkte, sårbare og udtryksfulde sangskrivning til dato, en proces der har været mere personlig og betydningsfuld end nogensinde før. Selvproduceret, minimalistisk, smukt og drabeligt er, hvad det nye Hjalte Ross album varsler.
Allerede med de to album, debuten ’Embody’ (2018) og opfølgeren ‘Waves of Haste’ (2020), slog den prisvindende unge kunstner sit navn fast både i Danmark og på den internationale sangskriverscene. Pladerne blev fulgt op af anmelderroste koncerter, festivaler og stor opmærksomhed.
KEXP, MOJO, Uncut, Clash Magazine, Politiken, Soundvenue, Jyllands-Posten, Gaffa er blot nogle af dem, der kastede deres kærlighed på den danske sangskriver. Live, vil man kunne opleve det, der gør Ross og hans medmusikere til helt særlige talenter, når de til hver koncert lader sangene leve i øjeblikket og fremfører dem nyfortolkede, frit og levende. Uanset om Hjalte Ross optræder med sine sange solo, med band, strygerensemble, eller alt derimellem, er det med en ægte, nærværende følsomhed, der med sikkerhed bevæger publikum. Hvad enten det er en skrøbelig acapella eller en støjende guitar, formår Hjalte at holde et fast greb om intensiteten. Kom på Loppen d. 11 Oktober og oplev dansk sangskrivertalent i verdensklasse.
TILFØJ TIL KALENDER
Fredag 11. okt 2024

posts.title: trust
posts.body:
Kom en tur med ned i den mørke og kolde synthpop kælder, når TR/ST lægger vejen forbi Loppen den 19. oktober!
Canadiske TR/ST så sin begyndelse under navnet “Trust” i starten af sidste årti, drevet frem af Robert Alfons dybe stemme og Maya Postepskis iskolde og ildevarslende beats. Postepski forlod projektet efter TR/STs anden udgivelse “Joyland”, men efter kort pause gjorde Alfons solo-comeback i 2019, og siden da har han drevet projektet videre med fast hånd, en dronende basgang efter den anden.
Selvom TR/ST er baseret i Toronto, lyder deres dystre synth-pop som om, at den er kravlet op fra dansegulvet i mørk og kold kælder i Berlin eller Paris. 80’ernes synthpop-klichéer støves af og få et frisk skud coldwave og industrielt præg i TR/ST hypnotiserende og dunkle verden. I januar 2024 udgav TR/ST en ny selvbetitlet EP, der tilføjer et nyt og cinematisk udtryk til TR/STs kolde univers, som Alfons selv beskriver som "Bigger, better, beautiful, and buried in mud."
Formodentlig har vi endnu mere ny musik at vente fra den canadiske elektrosmed, men indtil da kan man glæde sig til en tur med i ned i kælderen på Loppen den 19. oktober!
TILFØJ TIL KALENDER

posts.title: Crash Test Dummies
posts.body:
Mmm Mmm Mmm Mmm... 90'erne er tilbage og det er Crash Test Dummies også lørdag den 26. oktober på Loppen!
Sidste år var det præcis 30 år siden, at Crash Test Dummies single "Mmm Mmm Mmm Mmm" sad fast i alles øregange. For at fejre hit-pladen
God Shuffled His Feet
er det canadiske alternative rockband, Crash Test Dummies, igen på landevejen og passerer København og Loppen den 26. oktober.
Bandet kickstartede allerede deres karriere igen, da den multi-Grammy nominerede plade havde jubilæum  2018, hvor Crash Test Dummies for første gang i 20 år turnerede Nordamerika tyndt. Siden da har foden været solidt placeret på speederen for de canadiske alt-rockere, der også i starten af 2023 udgav deres første single i næsten 10 år.
“Touring again was not something we’d planned on, but surprisingly – at least to me – there are lots of people who many years later, that still want to come and hear us. The folks that are coming out to see these shows tell us their stories, some of them very funny, some very dark and all very personal. It’s very humbling, being in the confidence of so many people” fortæller den primære sangskriver Brad Roberts, “and it has inspired us to continue to tour and make music.”
Kom og genforelsk dig i Crash Test Dummies til efteråret!
Komcerten præsenteres i samarbejde med smash!bang!pow!, og forsalget begynder den 27. marts.
TILFØJ TIL KALENDER
Lørdag 26. okt 2024

posts.title: Total Hip Replacement
posts.body:
De sidste to år har Total Hip Replacement turneret verden rundt. I efteråret 2024 kommer orkesterets unikke solskinskombination af global groove pop, reggae og dub tilbage på de danske landeveje, hvor Total Hip Replacement tager et stop på Loppen den 1. november med uimodståelige rytmer, musikalsk virtousitet og helt nyt materiale med i bagagen!
Total Hip Replacement er et groove-kollektiv kendt for sine energiske og unikke livekoncerter. Bandet navigerer alt fra berusende reggae-rytmer, sjælfulde melodier og dub til pop, der sammenflettes øko- og samfundskritik med et klart budskab om den dystre vej, som vores verden går i.
Med en blanding af stærke rytmer og organisk, udtryksfuld virtuositet dannes en lyd, der veksler mellem at være fremadstormende og hypnotiserende. Tunge grooves, detaljerede blæserarrangementer og intense synthesizere mødes i et musikalsk landskab, der er mørkt og længselsfuldt, men fuld af håb.
Siden bandets første EP-udgivelse,
Keep The Fire Alive
, har gruppen udskåret sig deres egen niché i det musikalske landskab cementeret på et solidt fundament af musikalsk kunnen og en unik blanding af global rytmisk musik og ung pop. Bandets seneste udgivelse,
Anyankofo
, udkom i 2022 til generelkritikerros, skiven fik blandt andet 5/6 stjerner i GAFFA med ordene:
“Det er ofte ved de uforudsigelige valg de store oplevelser venter, hvilket dette projekt så absolut vidner om... Den jazzede blæsersektion blæser bogstavelig talt lytteren bagover i en musikalsk cocktail tilsat de fedeste afrikanske beats, der gør det kropumuligt at sidde stille til.”
De sidste to år har Total Hip Replacement turneret i Brasilien, Ghana, Europa og Grønland, men til efteråret er det ni mand høje orkester igen tilbage på de danske landeveje. Undervejs har Total Hip Replacement hentet masser af inspiration fra deres rejse med musikken rundt i verden, så det bliver også med lommerne fulde af nyt materiale,  når Total Hip Replacement rammer Loppen den. 1. november! Det bliver godt, det bliver groovy - vi ses!
TILFØJ TIL KALENDER
Fredag 01. nov 2024

posts.title: Royel Otis
posts.body:
Med et anderkendende nik fra Sophie Ellis-Bextor, er den australske indieduo, Royel Otis, blevet en viral sensation med deres cover af "Murder On The Dancefloor". Duoen har dog meget mere at byde på, så glæd dig til at opleve den fremadstormende indiopopduo live på Loppen d. 2. november.
Billetsalget starter fredag d. 10. maj kl. 11.00 via Tikkio.
Royel Otis' består af barndomsvennerne Otis Pavlovic og Royel Maddell, og duoen blev oprindeligt dannet i 2019. Langsomt under pandemien begyndte gruppen af dryppe musik ud, og hurtigt fik Royel Otis en voksende fanskare via bl.a. BBC Radio 6 Music, triple j og amerikanske college-radioer.
I 2024 har det for alvor taget fart for Royel Otis, som til dato har samlet over 140 millioner streams, og lige er taget på deres debut-headlinerturné i Storbritannien og Europa. Senest blev deres triple j Like A Version-optagelse af Sophie Ellis-Bextors "Murder On The Dancefloor" en viral TikTok-sensation globalt, og den har i 2024 toppet adskillige hitlister. Med et anderkendende nik fra Sophie selv, forbliver den på single- og streaminghitlisterne i Australien, Europa, USA og Storbritannien.
Året har også budt på debutalbummet
Pratts & Payne,
hvor Royel Otis svinger mellem melodisk, pop-inspireret indie og woozy psych, men det føles aldrig bundet til én genrebestemt bane. Så snart en stilart eller stemning har overskredet sin velkomst, bliver håndbremsen til psykedelisk underlighed eller dissonansstøj trukket.
Pratts & Payne
samler alt fra bandets historie på én plade, der er ærbødig overfor deres begyndelse, men ikke er bange for at skubbe duoen fremad med nye lyde. Der løber en spontan energi igennem pladen, der til tider minder om Talking Heads, og der bydes både på slow jams, skrigende guitarer og masser af dansable energi.
Fang Royel Otis på Loppen til november!
TILFØJ TIL KALENDER

posts.title: Jonny Hefty & Jøden
posts.body:
De siger, at det er blevet dyrt at tænde for varmen, men bare rolig. Den kommer til at få fuld gas, når Jonny Hefty & Jøden besøger og besætter Loppen fredag d. 8. november med DJ Static til at håndtere aftenens beats på kyndigste vis!
Ja, du er måske blevet et par år ældre siden sidst, men bare rolig, hos os har
Gamle Dreng (m/k)
altid været et kompliment. Og ja, vi ved godt, at du er blevet lidt dårligere til at gå til koncert, men nu skal det sgu være og skal det være vildt, så lad det være helt vildt.
Til efteråret 2024 tager Jonny Hefty & Jøden rundt i landet, og fandeme om du ikke skal da! Måske får du endda et lift ned af Memory Lane med evergreens, der minder dig om dengang det hele var lidt federe og meget farligere.
Jonny Hefty er stadigvæk Aalborgs mest langhårede heavy-rapper, og Jøden har absolut ikke skåret ned for hverken energien eller charmen. Danmarks skarpeste duo og back-up kommer til din by, så husk at skrive til din chef, og sig at du kommer til at ligne en hængt kat mandag morgen, når du møder ind efter koncerten på Loppen fredag d. 8. november!
TILFØJ TIL KALENDER
Fredag 08. nov 2024

posts.title: Nadine Shah
posts.body:
Oven på tre turbulente år er Nadine Shah ude med et nyt album, Filthy Underneath, der modigt og ærligt kaster lys på livets skyggesider. Mød den britiske art-pop singer songwriter i hendes kompromisløst menneskelige musik på Loppen den 16. november!
Nadine Shah har etableret sig på den internationale musikscene med sin karakteristiske og intense art pop/rock. Den britiske singer-songwriter besidder en stemme og mystik, der tit er blevet beskrevet som en blanding af Nick Cave og Mick Harvey, omend Shahs musik også præges af hendes kærlighed til jazz og pop, og religiøse Sufi sange, som hendes pakistanske far introducerede sig for.
Shahs musik er intimt og tabuløs, og hun er ikke bange for at tage fat i sine egne personlige tragedier og behandle dem direkte og ærligt med mørk humor og mod. Hendes debutplade Love You Dum and Mad (2013) behandler døden af to ekskærester, mens 2017’s Mercury Prize-vindende Holiday Destination sætter Shahs egne etniske rødder i kontekst af stigende nationalistiske tendenser på verdensplan.
I februar udgav Shah hendes mest personlige plade endnu, Filthy Underneath, der har rødderne i en turbulent tid for Shah gennem pandemien, hvor hun mistede sin mor, blev skilt efter et selvmordsforsøg og endte i rehabilitering. Albummet kaster lys på de smukke og grimme dele af livets skyggesider med lige dele intimitet og ironisk distance. Musikken tager afsæt i det iranske pop ikon Googoosh, den indiske disco-dronning Asha Puthli og “shitloads of glam rock” - alt andet var for sentimental til, at Shah kunne lytte til det, mens hendes liv lå i murbrokker. Filthy Underneath bæres derfor at en kontrast mellem catchy melodier og rå tekster, hvor de svære følelser skjules for øjnene af dig.
Nadine Shah er stærkt tilbage, og vi glæder os til et intimt og intenst møde med singer-songwriteren den 16. november!
Forsalget begynder den 7. juni kl. 11:00.
TILFØJ TIL KALENDER

posts.title: Personal Trainer
posts.body:
Er du til popmusik, der kan holde dig på tæerne, så leverer Amsterdams indiepopgruppe, Personal Trainer, den service fuldt ud! Med bandets anden udgivelse, ’Still Willing’, som udgives senere på sommeren, bydes der på DIY indiepop i overflod og musikalske eksperimenter i tråd med 2022's debut, ’Big Love Blanket’. Glæd dig til at opleve Personal Trainer live på Loppen d. 17. november!
Med ’Still Willing’ har Personal Trainer skrevet under på en pladekontrakt Bella Union og vender fornyet tilbage med et mangefacetteret album med skinnende kontraster, sprudlende melodier og sublim, legesyg lyrik: Kort sagt, et popalbum udført med dynamik og charme.
Som frontperson Willem Smit selv fortæller, er dette et album drevet af ekstremer; nogle gange energisk og højlydt, andre gange stille og eftertænksomt, men fyldt med skjulte fornøjelser: “
When I listen to the records I make, the main thing I hope is that every time something happens on them, you’re like, ‘Wow.’ I like to be taken by surprise like that on a record, to kind of be thrown around.”
Willem er epicentret for bandet, som har deres rødder i en musikscene med improviserede liveshows med konstant skiftende medlemmer fra forskellige lokale bands, der deler en travl scene. Live lineuppet anno 2024 er dog blevet mere fast, og består på nuværende tidspunkt af Willem Smit (vokal), Kilian Kayser (percussion), Leon Harms (trommer), Mart Boumans (guitar/sax), Franti Maresova (guitar), Ruben van Weegberg (bas) og Abel Tuinstra (keys/synths).
Personal Trainers skæve tilgang til popmusikken har gjort sig bemærket hos adskillige internationale musikmedier, og vi glæder os til at præsentere en popkoncert i særklasse på Loppen den 17. november!
“A triumph of creative soundcraft, knitting together samples, studio trickery, and towering hooks.”
-
Under The Radar
“Dutch indie-rockers expertly juggle with pathos, clatter and Malkmus-esque deadpan.”
-
MOJO
“Cushily familiar yet riotously unique; pantomiming and compelling.”
-
So Young Magazine
Billetsalget begynder fredag den 24. maj kl. 10:00.
TILFØJ TIL KALENDER
Søndag 17. nov 2024

posts.title: Shannon and the Clams
posts.body:
Shannon & The Clams har netop udgivet deres syvende studiealbum, og det er med stor fornøjelse, at vi endelige kan få lov til at præsentere den californiske garage-psych kvartet på Loppen den 19. november 2024!
Indierockens grundpill, Shannon & The Clams er kendt for deres feel-good, vintage-inspirerede, garage-psych lyd. Deres lyd går fra sort/hvid til farver på deres nye album,
The Moon Is In the Wrong Place
, der er produceret af den efterhånden faste samarbejdspartner Dan Auerbach fra The Black Keys. Albummet er skabt i kølvandet af sanger og bassist Shannon Shaws forlovede, Joe Haeners, tragiske og pludselige død i en bilulykke få uger inden deres bryllup. Albummet er deres en holistisk studie i sorg og en hyldest til livet, som indeholder nogle af de mest åbenhjertige og spændende sange i gruppens katalog.
Shaws bandkollegaer, guitarist Cody Blanchard, keyboardspiller Will Sprot og trommeslager Nate Mahan, hjalp hende med at skabe deres mest ambitiøse og følelsesladede album til dato. Titlen er taget fra en samtale mellem Shaw og Haener (der var lidt af en astrolog-novice), hvor Haener forsøgte at spørge, om Merkur var i retrograd. Den ildevarslende sætning blev fundamentet for pladen.
The Moon Is In The Wrong Place er Shannon & The Clams' syvende studiealbum og markerer mere end 15 års samarbejde. I efteråret 2024 tager kvartetten på Europa Tour, og vi glæder os rigtig meget til et længe ventet og ønsket besøg fra Cali-rockerne på Loppen tirsdag den 19. november!

posts.title: The Sheepdogs
posts.body:
70'erne har ringet, og de siger, at du trænger til noget rendyrket rock'n'roll, der ikke tager sig selv for seriøst! The Sheepdogs slukker din tørst efter tråd den 22. november.
The Sheepdogs er et hårdtslående, rendyrket rock'n'roll band fra Saskatoon, Saskatchewan, der er tilbage med Outta Sight, den grooviest, enkleste, mest gennemtrængende album af deres karriere. Indspillet under pandemien hvor bandet - Ewan Currie, Ryan Gullen, Sam Corbett, Jimmy Bowskill og Shamus Currie -, ligesom resten af os,  var forvirrede, strandede og isolerede under COVID. Deres reaktion var at gøre det, der kom mest naturligt for dem: at lave
stripped-down
rock 'n' roll.
“It’s a weird world. Everybody stuck in place, overthinking absolutely everything. We wanted to avoid all that—just get in the room, plug in your guitar and go. So that’s what we did,” siger sanger Ewan Currie. “Themes like optimism in the face of adversity, standing tall and staying strong, knowing that better times are around the corner kept coming through when making the record and it felt really damned good to play.”
Som svar til den frygten og manglen på indkomst for en gruppe, der tjener deres levebrød ved at spille hundredvis af årlige shows - gjorde Sheepdogs det, der var instinktivt for dem, siden de begyndte at jamme som teenagere. Med ingen køreplan og en generel usikkerhed hænger over universet satte bandet deres forstærkere til og delte riffs og melodier.
På trods af deres utrolige arv, der omfatter #1 sange, guld og platin albums, utallige udsolgte turnér og landing cover af Rolling Stone, er gruppen aldrig blevet navlepillende eller er holdt op med at stole på hinanden. På 'Outta Sight' finder bandet tilbage til sine rødder efter den psykedeliske udforskning af Changing Colours. Musikken er instinktiv og groove-baseret. Det er feel-good musik lavet til at hjælpe dem og lytteren med at fejre livet.
Glæd dig til rendyrket rock'n'roll, der ikke tager sig selv for seriøst den 22. november på Loppen.
Billetsalget starter den 7. juni!
TILFØJ TIL KALENDER
Fredag 22. nov 2024

posts.title: EARLY JAMES
posts.body:
Med tydelige nik til Tom Waits og The Black Keys-frontmanden Dan Auerbach i producersædet krænger den amerikanske singer-songwriter Early James sin sjæl ud på sit seneste album
Strange Time To Be Alive
. Til efteråret vender den Alabama-baserede blues-rock-crooner retur til Danmark, når han gæster Loppen lørdag d. 23. november.
Early James er en ung kunstner fyldt med spøgelser fra en anden tid. Hans formskiftende musik er umulig at putte i en kasse, men efter få minutters gennemlytning vil du forstå, at Dan Auerbach igen har spottet et nyt, karakteristisk, imponerende modent og slående fokuseret talent med en lys fremtid.
Med udgivelsen af den anmelderroste debutplade
Singing For My Supper
i 2020, fik Alabama-blues'eren for alvor sat sit præg på den amerikanske folkscene. Med et mix af sydstatsblues, country, folk, pop og jazz fremkaldte han spøgelserne af artister som Lee Hazlewood og Tim Buckley.
I august 2022 vendte Early James tilbage med albummet
Strange Time To Be Alive
, hvor han med sin karakteristiske croon kærtegnede hver eneste stavelse med formidable finesse. Her fremtryllede han spøgelserne fra store sydlige gotiske forfattere som Eudora Welty og William Faulkner, mens han kanaliserede de hjemsøgte ånder af Tom Wait og Townes Van Zandt.
I 2022 havde vi fornøjelsen af Early James og band, som brillierede med en inddragende koncert, og til efteråret vender han tilbage til den lavloftede rockhule. Gå ikke glip af en unik stemme, når Early James igen rammer de europæiske landeveje!
TILFØJ TIL KALENDER
Lørdag 23. nov 2024

posts.title: Destin Conrad
posts.body:
Destin Conrad plays at Pumpehuset on June 26, 2024
Destin Conrad is a sensual R&B singer from Tampa, Florida. He got his start in the music industry when he started making Vines and gained more than 1 million followers on the platform. A few years later, he co-wrote Kehlani's album "It Was Good Until It Wasn't", which went #2 on Billboard.
Destin's debut project, "COLORWAY", was released in 2021 and has hit more than 100 million streams. He spent most of 2022 on the road supporting Syd and Kehlani on their tours and then released his second project, "SATIN", which was just as successful as "COLORWAY". Fader has described his catalog as "lush, intimate earworms infused with a gentle touch."
I 2023 tog Destin på sin første headliner-tour i EU og UK, hvor han udsolgte shows i Amsterdam, Paris og tre aftener i London. Han har senest udgivet "SUBMISSIVE" og "SUBMISSIVE2". Begge udgivelser består af 9 sange har har features fra Masego, Jordan Ward og Alex Isley.
Destin Conrad started 2024 with his first headline tour in the USA, where he will play in 35 cities. He then goes back to Europe and can be seen in the Pump House on 26 June 2024.

posts.title: Richie Kotzen
posts.body:
The front man from The Winery Dogs is ready to go solo in the Pumpehuset
Richie Kotzen has always been on a clear mission as an artist. Although he is recognized worldwide as an excellent guitar player, an emotional singer and dynamic live performer, his most important task is to maintain a special common thread in his music and especially his songwriting. Good songs are truly Kotzen's
special trademark
, and the man has spent decades making sure he delivers the goods - always.
As a vocalist, Kotzen's style is at the intersection of Paul Rodgers, Terence Trent D'Arby (better known these days as Sananda Maitreya) and Rod Stewart. The vocal energy is also born into his love for strong songwriting, where he has been inspired by Daryl Hall and Don Henley, among others.
The nerve about Richie Kotzen is that he can make the everyday and mundane seem magical: "I'm more of a conversational writer," explains Kotzen. "I don't write about aliens and spaceships. It's more about what I think and what I feel. I wait until I have something to say - and usually that's when it all comes together. When something hits me, sing I put it into my phone and then it either lives there and waits for another day or I work on it and it ends up on an album. That's my process."
Richie Kotzen is known as being part of several rock acts such as SMITH/KOTZEN, which was made in collaboration with his old friend and guitarist/backing vocalist in Iron Maiden, Adrian Smith, and not least the rock trio, The Winery Dogs, with whom he visited Copenhagen in the autumn, where music site
RockZeit.dk
among other things wrote: "The trio was in top form and there were no limits to their balancing skills, and it was incredible what they could squeeze into the hard rock genre."
This time you can experience Kotzen in solo format, where he will give the audience an insight into the kind of music he himself knows and fell in love with as a young man, and which he still continues to pay tribute to and rethink. The sound of Rochie Kotzen is a walk down the nostalgic rock path, where small, innovative and surprising touches spring forth.

posts.title: Babasónicos
posts.body:
90s rock from Argentina
After a successful European tour with sold-out shows and enthusiastic audiences in 2023, Babasonicos is ready to captivate audiences across Europe once again.
Known for their unique performances, the Argentinian rock band is ready to embark on another exciting journey through the continent's vibrant cities and cultural hubs.
With their unique blend of rock, pop and experimental sounds, the Babasonicos have gained a dedicated following that spans national borders and transcends language barriers.
Their dynamic stage presence combined with their eclectic repertoire of hits spanning decades promises an unforgettable experience for fans old and new.

posts.title: Lil Darkie
posts.body:
Der venter hidsige, eksperimenterende trap-sange, når Lil Darkie svinger forbi hovedstaden
Lil Darkie and his band, The Dark Army, travel across the Atlantic once again to play for their European fans. Lil Darkie is one of the most controversial figures in recent hip-hop. He has built a unique style, combining everything from country and R&B to noise and older hip-hop - a cocktail that has often been described as 'trap metal'. With his furious flow and heavy beats, Lil Darkie delivers some of the most intense concerts on the hip-hop scene. His style is extremely experimental and his lyrics extremely provocative, so the listener has to hold his tongue when Lil Darkie channels his anger into his songs.

posts.title: Hanabie
posts.body:
Det japanske Harajuku-core band Hanabie eksploderer i Pumpehuset
De er i krydsfeltet mellem metalcore, japansk popkultur og Akihabara-æstetik: Tokyo-bandet HANABIE gjorde sig bemærkede allerede fra debut-EP 'Cherry Blossoms Are Blooming', som forbløffede alle inden for lytteafstand. Kunne det virkelig lyde sådan?
Since then, HANABIE has continued to rise. The music has become heavier, the songs have become even better. And by adding elements from hip-hop, electronica and nu-metal, they have created their very own genre, Harajuku-core. A genre that is as hard as it is catchy.
In 2023, HANABIE went on their first solo European and US tour. Of course they were successful. At the same time, they unveiled their big debut "Reborn Superstar!". And those who understood, they understood, they were sold immediately.
Now HANABIE is finally here. In July, we welcome Yukina, Matsuri, Hettsu and Chika to Stockholm, Copenhagen and Oslo. Expect three decent thunderstorms in concert format. This really shouldn't be missed.

posts.title: Plini
posts.body:
The Australian guitar virtuoso takes over Pumpehuset in July
Plini excels both with progressive rock and jazz fusion, technical brilliance and great emotional depth. In December, he released the "Mirage" EP, which showcased his unique ability to weave complex melodies together with simple, genuine beauty.
Ever since those early online releases, Plini has continually continued to innovate and inspire listeners and musicians alike by constantly challenging both his own and genre's musical boundaries. Along the way, Plini's position as a leading force within the progressive scene has been cemented. Now we get the chance to enjoy both his technical and emotional genius when Plini performs a long-awaited concert in Copenhagen.

posts.title: Wos
posts.body:
Live Tonite is proud to present the Danish debut show of WOS, the Argentinian alternative rap/freestyle artist who has gone on to become one of the most important artists on the hip hop scene.
WOS, born Valentín Oliva, is an Argentinian artist known for his multifaceted talents in music, rap and performance. WOS rose to prominence in the Argentine music scene and gained widespread recognition with his debut album "Oscuro Éxtasis", which propelled him to international recognition and garnered numerous awards and accolades. With a unique blend of alternative rock, rap and elements of Argentine folklore, WOS continues to push boundaries with its distinct sound and captivating performances. As a versatile artist and cultural personality, WOS continues to be a driving force in shaping the modern music landscape in Argentina and beyond. Two and a half years after the release of the "Oscuro Extasis" album, WOS presents "DESCARTABLE" - his third studio album. In this work, he surprises us again with a fusion of sounds that achieves an impressive sound that deepens his journey through alternative rock, intertwining with genres such as folklore, synthetic pop from the 80s, emphasizing his generational crossover, while not ignoring his origins in rap, and the most classic rock and roll, which lies between the most characteristic elements of Argentine music and Latin American rock from the 90s.
On June 20, fans in Denmark finally get the chance to experience the energy and excitement of his show, which starts at 21.00 in Pumpehuset, Copenhagen (all ages are welcome, no refunds). Get your tickets now.

posts.title: No Te Va Gustar
posts.body:
Latin American genre jugglers play the summer into the Pumpehuset
No Te VA Gustar celebrates 30 years of music with an epic international tour. From their humble beginnings in Uruguay in 1994 to performing to thousands in more than twenty countries, NTVG reflects on their journey. Their upcoming tour, "30 años", will be a musical milestone celebrating the timeless power of their songs.
The tour is a tribute to the camaraderie and unwavering support of passionate fans who have made the journey unforgettable. NTVG is known for their fusion of rock with reggae, folk, murga and ska influences. With 10 studio albums, one acoustic live album, five live albums, one documentary and one concert film, NTVG has earned 9 Latin Grammy nominations. Now they will be marking three decades in the industry by continuing to captivate audiences with their powerful performances. The tour will be a celebration of their illustrious career, reminding fans why NTVG remains a beloved fixture in the music scene.
Den 22. juni får fans i Danmark endelig chancen for at opleve energien og spændingen NTVG's show (for alle aldre, ingen refusion). Gå ikke glip af denne mulighed for at se et af de mest ikoniske bands i latinamerikansk musikhistorie.

Ever since those early online releases, Plini has continually continued to innovate and inspire listeners and musicians alike by constantly challenging both his own and genre's musical boundaries. Along the way, Plini's position as a leading force within the progressive scene has been cemented. Now we get the chance to enjoy both his technical and emotional genius when Plini performs a long-awaited concert in Copenhagen.

posts.title: Richie Kotzen
posts.body:
The front man from The Winery Dogs is ready to go solo in the Pumpehuset
Richie Kotzen has always been on a clear mission as an artist. Although he is recognized worldwide as an excellent guitar player, an emotional singer and dynamic live performer, his most important task is to maintain a special common thread in his music and especially his songwriting. Good songs are truly Kotzen's
special trademark
, and the man has spent decades making sure he delivers the goods - always.
As a vocalist, Kotzen's style is at the intersection of Paul Rodgers, Terence Trent D'Arby (better known these days as Sananda Maitreya) and Rod Stewart. The vocal energy is also born into his love for strong songwriting, where he has been inspired by Daryl Hall and Don Henley, among others.
The nerve about Richie Kotzen is that he can make the everyday and mundane seem magical: "I'm more of a conversational writer," explains Kotzen. "I don't write about aliens and spaceships. It's more about what I think and what I feel. I wait until I have something to say - and usually that's when it all comes together. When something hits me, sing I put it into my phone and then it either lives there and waits for another day or I work on it and it ends up on an album. That's my process."
Richie Kotzen is known as being part of several rock acts such as SMITH/KOTZEN, which was made in collaboration with his old friend and guitarist/backing vocalist in Iron Maiden, Adrian Smith, and not least the rock trio, The Winery Dogs, with whom he visited Copenhagen in the autumn, where music site
RockZeit.dk
among other things wrote: "The trio was in top form and there were no limits to their balancing skills, and it was incredible what they could squeeze into the hard rock genre."
This time you can experience Kotzen in solo format, where he will give the audience an insight into the kind of music he himself knows and fell in love with as a young man, and which he still continues to pay tribute to and rethink. The sound of Rochie Kotzen is a walk down the nostalgic rock path, where small, innovative and surprising touches spring forth.

posts.title: Destin Conrad
posts.body:
Destin Conrad plays at Pumpehuset on June 26, 2024
Destin Conrad is a sensual R&B singer from Tampa, Florida. He got his start in the music industry when he started making Vines and gained more than 1 million followers on the platform. A few years later, he co-wrote Kehlani's album "It Was Good Until It Wasn't", which went #2 on Billboard.
Destin's debut project, "COLORWAY", was released in 2021 and has hit more than 100 million streams. He spent most of 2022 on the road supporting Syd and Kehlani on their tours and then released his second project, "SATIN", which was just as successful as "COLORWAY". Fader has described his catalog as "lush, intimate earworms infused with a gentle touch."
I 2023 tog Destin på sin første headliner-tour i EU og UK, hvor han udsolgte shows i Amsterdam, Paris og tre aftener i London. Han har senest udgivet "SUBMISSIVE" og "SUBMISSIVE2". Begge udgivelser består af 9 sange har har features fra Masego, Jordan Ward og Alex Isley.
Destin Conrad started 2024 with his first headline tour in the USA, where he will play in 35 cities. He then goes back to Europe and can be seen in the Pump House on 26 June 2024.

posts.title: Wos
posts.body:
Live Tonite is proud to present the Danish debut show of WOS, the Argentinian alternative rap/freestyle artist who has gone on to become one of the most important artists on the hip hop scene.
WOS, born Valentín Oliva, is an Argentinian artist known for his multifaceted talents in music, rap and performance. WOS rose to prominence in the Argentine music scene and gained widespread recognition with his debut album "Oscuro Éxtasis", which propelled him to international recognition and garnered numerous awards and accolades. With a unique blend of alternative rock, rap and elements of Argentine folklore, WOS continues to push boundaries with its distinct sound and captivating performances. As a versatile artist and cultural personality, WOS continues to be a driving force in shaping the modern music landscape in Argentina and beyond. Two and a half years after the release of the "Oscuro Extasis" album, WOS presents "DESCARTABLE" - his third studio album. In this work, he surprises us again with a fusion of sounds that achieves an impressive sound that deepens his journey through alternative rock, intertwining with genres such as folklore, synthetic pop from the 80s, emphasizing his generational crossover, while not ignoring his origins in rap, and the most classic rock and roll, which lies between the most characteristic elements of Argentine music and Latin American rock from the 90s.
On June 20, fans in Denmark finally get the chance to experience the energy and excitement of his show, which starts at 21.00 in Pumpehuset, Copenhagen (all ages are welcome, no refunds). Get your tickets now.

posts.title: Richie Kotzen
posts.body:
The front man from The Winery Dogs is ready to go solo in the Pumpehuset
Richie Kotzen has always been on a clear mission as an artist. posts.title: Lil Darkie
posts.body:
Der venter hidsige, eksperimenterende trap-sange, når Lil Darkie svinger forbi hovedstaden
Lil Darkie and his band, The Dark Army, travel across the Atlantic once again to play for their European fans. Lil Darkie is one of the most controversial figures in recent hip-hop. He has built a unique style, combining everything from country and R&B to noise and older hip-hop - a cocktail that has often been described as 'trap metal'. With his furious flow and heavy beats, Lil Darkie delivers some of the most intense concerts on the hip-hop scene. His style is extremely experimental and his lyrics extremely provocative, so the listener has to hold his tongue when Lil Darkie channels his anger into his songs.

posts.title: Hanabie
posts.body:
Det japanske Harajuku-core band Hanabie eksploderer i Pumpehuset
De er i krydsfeltet mellem metalcore, japansk popkultur og Akihabara-æstetik: Tokyo-bandet HANABIE gjorde sig bemærkede allerede fra debut-EP 'Cherry Blossoms Are Blooming', som forbløffede alle inden for lytteafstand. Kunne det virkelig lyde sådan?
Since then, HANABIE has continued to rise. The music has become heavier, the songs have become even better. And by adding elements from hip-hop, electronica and nu-metal, they have created their very own genre, Harajuku-core. A genre that is as hard as it is catchy.
In 2023, HANABIE went on their first solo European and US tour. Of course they were successful. At the same time, they unveiled their big debut "Reborn Superstar!". And those who understood, they understood, they were sold immediately.
Now HANABIE is finally here. In July, we welcome Yukina, Matsuri, Hettsu and Chika to Stockholm, Copenhagen and Oslo. Expect three decent thunderstorms in concert format. This really shouldn't be missed.

posts.body:
Det japanske Harajuku-core band Hanabie eksploderer i Pumpehuset
De er i krydsfeltet mellem metalcore, japansk popkultur og Akihabara-æstetik: Tokyo-bandet HANABIE gjorde sig bemærkede allerede fra debut-EP 'Cherry Blossoms Are Blooming', som forbløffede alle inden for lytteafstand. Kunne det virkelig lyde sådan?
Since then, HANABIE has continued to rise. The music has become heavier, the songs have become even better. And by adding elements from hip-hop, electronica and nu-metal, they have created their very own genre, Harajuku-core. A genre that is as hard as it is catchy.
In 2023, HANABIE went on their first solo European and US tour. Of course they were successful. At the same time, they unveiled their big debut "Reborn Superstar!". And those who understood, they understood, they were sold immediately.
Now HANABIE is finally here. In July, we welcome Yukina, Matsuri, Hettsu and Chika to Stockholm, Copenhagen and Oslo. Expect three decent thunderstorms in concert format. This really shouldn't be missed.

posts.title: Babasónicos
posts.body:
90s rock from Argentina
After a successful European tour with sold-out shows and enthusiastic audiences in 2023, Babasonicos is ready to captivate audiences across Europe once again.
Known for their unique performances, the Argentinian rock band is ready to embark on another exciting journey through the continent's vibrant cities and cultural hubs.
With their unique blend of rock, pop and experimental sounds, the Babasonicos have gained a dedicated following that spans national borders and transcends language barriers.
Their dynamic stage presence combined with their eclectic repertoire of hits spanning decades promises an unforgettable experience for fans old and new.

posts.title: Plini
posts.body:
The Australian guitar virtuoso takes over Pumpehuset in July
Plini excels both with progressive rock and jazz fusion, technical brilliance and great emotional depth. In December, he released the "Mirage" EP, which showcased his unique ability to weave complex melodies together with simple, genuine beauty.
Ever since those early online releases, Plini has continually continued to innovate and inspire listeners and musicians alike by constantly challenging both his own and genre's musical boundaries. Along the way, Plini's position as a leading force within the progressive scene has been cemented. Now we get the chance to enjoy both his technical and emotional genius when Plini performs a long-awaited concert in Copenhagen.

posts.title: Lil Darkie
posts.body:
Der venter hidsige, eksperimenterende trap-sange, når Lil Darkie svinger forbi hovedstaden
Lil Darkie and his band, The Dark Army, travel across the Atlantic once again to play for their European fans. Lil Darkie is one of the most controversial figures in recent hip-hop. He has built a unique style, combining everything from country and R&B to noise and older hip-hop - a cocktail that has often been described as 'trap metal'. With his furious flow and heavy beats, Lil Darkie delivers some of the most intense concerts on the hip-hop scene. His style is extremely experimental and his lyrics extremely provocative, so the listener has to hold his tongue when Lil Darkie channels his anger into his songs.

posts.title: No Te Va Gustar
posts.body:
Latin American genre jugglers play the summer into the Pumpehuset
No Te VA Gustar celebrates 30 years of music with an epic international tour. From their humble beginnings in Uruguay in 1994 to performing to thousands in more than twenty countries, NTVG reflects on their journey. Their upcoming tour, "30 años", will be a musical milestone celebrating the timeless power of their songs.
The tour is a tribute to the camaraderie and unwavering support of passionate fans who have made the journey unforgettable. NTVG is known for their fusion of rock with reggae, folk, murga and ska influences. With 10 studio albums, one acoustic live album, five live albums, one documentary and one concert film, NTVG has earned 9 Latin Grammy nominations. Now they will be marking three decades in the industry by continuing to captivate audiences with their powerful performances. The tour will be a celebration of their illustrious career, reminding fans why NTVG remains a beloved fixture in the music scene.
Den 22. juni får fans i Danmark endelig chancen for at opleve energien og spændingen NTVG's show (for alle aldre, ingen refusion). Gå ikke glip af denne mulighed for at se et af de mest ikoniske bands i latinamerikansk musikhistorie.

posts.title: Destin Conrad
posts.body:
Destin Conrad plays at Pumpehuset on June 26, 2024
Destin Conrad is a sensual R&B singer from Tampa, Florida. He got his start in the music industry when he started making Vines and gained more than 1 million followers on the platform. A few years later, he co-wrote Kehlani's album "It Was Good Until It Wasn't", which went #2 on Billboard.
Destin's debut project, "COLORWAY", was released in 2021 and has hit more than 100 million streams. He spent most of 2022 on the road supporting Syd and Kehlani on their tours and then released his second project, "SATIN", which was just as successful as "COLORWAY". Fader has described his catalog as "lush, intimate earworms infused with a gentle touch."
I 2023 tog Destin på sin første headliner-tour i EU og UK, hvor han udsolgte shows i Amsterdam, Paris og tre aftener i London. Han har senest udgivet "SUBMISSIVE" og "SUBMISSIVE2". Begge udgivelser består af 9 sange har har features fra Masego, Jordan Ward og Alex Isley.
Destin Conrad started 2024 with his first headline tour in the USA, where he will play in 35 cities. He then goes back to Europe and can be seen in the Pump House on 26 June 2024.

posts.title: Wos
posts.body:
Live Tonite is proud to present the Danish debut show of WOS, the Argentinian alternative rap/freestyle artist who has gone on to become one of the most important artists on the hip hop scene.
WOS, born Valentín Oliva, is an Argentinian artist known for his multifaceted talents in music, rap and performance. WOS rose to prominence in the Argentine music scene and gained widespread recognition with his debut album "Oscuro Éxtasis", which propelled him to international recognition and garnered numerous awards and accolades. With a unique blend of alternative rock, rap and elements of Argentine folklore, WOS continues to push boundaries with its distinct sound and captivating performances. As a versatile artist and cultural personality, WOS continues to be a driving force in shaping the modern music landscape in Argentina and beyond. Two and a half years after the release of the "Oscuro Extasis" album, WOS presents "DESCARTABLE" - his third studio album. In this work, he surprises us again with a fusion of sounds that achieves an impressive sound that deepens his journey through alternative rock, intertwining with genres such as folklore, synthetic pop from the 80s, emphasizing his generational crossover, while not ignoring his origins in rap, and the most classic rock and roll, which lies between the most characteristic elements of Argentine music and Latin American rock from the 90s.
On June 20, fans in Denmark finally get the chance to experience the energy and excitement of his show, which starts at 21.00 in Pumpehuset, Copenhagen (all ages are welcome, no refunds). Get your tickets now.

After a successful European tour with sold-out shows and enthusiastic audiences in 2023, Babasonicos is ready to captivate audiences across Europe once again.

posts.title: Richie Kotzen
posts.body:
The front man from The Winery Dogs is ready to go solo in the Pumpehuset
Richie Kotzen has always been on a clear mission as an artist. Although he is recognized worldwide as an excellent guitar player, an emotional singer and dynamic live performer, his most important task is to maintain a special common thread in his music and especially his songwriting. Good songs are truly Kotzen's
special trademark
, and the man has spent decades making sure he delivers the goods - always.
As a vocalist, Kotzen's style is at the intersection of Paul Rodgers, Terence Trent D'Arby (better known these days as Sananda Maitreya) and Rod Stewart. The vocal energy is also born into his love for strong songwriting, where he has been inspired by Daryl Hall and Don Henley, among others.
The nerve about Richie Kotzen is that he can make the everyday and mundane seem magical: "I'm more of a conversational writer," explains Kotzen. "I don't write about aliens and spaceships. It's more about what I think and what I feel. I wait until I have something to say - and usually that's when it all comes together. When something hits me, sing I put it into my phone and then it either lives there and waits for another day or I work on it and it ends up on an album. That's my process."
Richie Kotzen is known as being part of several rock acts such as SMITH/KOTZEN, which was made in collaboration with his old friend and guitarist/backing vocalist in Iron Maiden, Adrian Smith, and not least the rock trio, The Winery Dogs, with whom he visited Copenhagen in the autumn, where music site
RockZeit.dk
among other things wrote: "The trio was in top form and there were no limits to their balancing skills, and it was incredible what they could squeeze into the hard rock genre."
This time you can experience Kotzen in solo format, where he will give the audience an insight into the kind of music he himself knows and fell in love with as a young man, and which he still continues to pay tribute to and rethink. The sound of Rochie Kotzen is a walk down the nostalgic rock path, where small, innovative and surprising touches spring forth.

Their dynamic stage presence combined with their eclectic repertoire of hits spanning decades promises an unforgettable experience for fans old and new.

posts.title: Hanabie
posts.body:
Det japanske Harajuku-core band Hanabie eksploderer i Pumpehuset
De er i krydsfeltet mellem metalcore, japansk popkultur og Akihabara-æstetik: Tokyo-bandet HANABIE gjorde sig bemærkede allerede fra debut-EP 'Cherry Blossoms Are Blooming', som forbløffede alle inden for lytteafstand. Kunne det virkelig lyde sådan?
Since then, HANABIE has continued to rise. The music has become heavier, the songs have become even better. And by adding elements from hip-hop, electronica and nu-metal, they have created their very own genre, Harajuku-core. A genre that is as hard as it is catchy.
In 2023, HANABIE went on their first solo European and US tour. Of course they were successful. At the same time, they unveiled their big debut "Reborn Superstar!". And those who understood, they understood, they were sold immediately.
Now HANABIE is finally here. In July, we welcome Yukina, Matsuri, Hettsu and Chika to Stockholm, Copenhagen and Oslo. Expect three decent thunderstorms in concert format. This really shouldn't be missed.

posts.title: Plini
posts.body:
The Australian guitar virtuoso takes over Pumpehuset in July
Plini excels both with progressive rock and jazz fusion, technical brilliance and great emotional depth. In December, he released the "Mirage" EP, which showcased his unique ability to weave complex melodies together with simple, genuine beauty.
Ever since those early online releases, Plini has continually continued to innovate and inspire listeners and musicians alike by constantly challenging both his own and genre's musical boundaries. Along the way, Plini's position as a leading force within the progressive scene has been cemented. Now we get the chance to enjoy both his technical and emotional genius when Plini performs a long-awaited concert in Copenhagen.

posts.title: Richie Kotzen
posts.body:
The front man from The Winery Dogs is ready to go solo in the Pumpehuset
Richie Kotzen has always been on a clear mission as an artist. Although he is recognized worldwide as an excellent guitar player, an emotional singer and dynamic live performer, his most important task is to maintain a special common thread in his music and especially his songwriting. Good songs are truly Kotzen's
special trademark
, and the man has spent decades making sure he delivers the goods - always.
As a vocalist, Kotzen's style is at the intersection of Paul Rodgers, Terence Trent D'Arby (better known these days as Sananda Maitreya) and Rod Stewart. The vocal energy is also born into his love for strong songwriting, where he has been inspired by Daryl Hall and Don Henley, among others.
The nerve about Richie Kotzen is that he can make the everyday and mundane seem magical: "I'm more of a conversational writer," explains Kotzen. "I don't write about aliens and spaceships. It's more about what I think and what I feel. I wait until I have something to say - and usually that's when it all comes together. When something hits me, sing I put it into my phone and then it either lives there and waits for another day or I work on it and it ends up on an album. That's my process."
Richie Kotzen is known as being part of several rock acts such as SMITH/KOTZEN, which was made in collaboration with his old friend and guitarist/backing vocalist in Iron Maiden, Adrian Smith, and not least the rock trio, The Winery Dogs, with whom he visited Copenhagen in the autumn, where music site
RockZeit.dk
among other things wrote: "The trio was in top form and there were no limits to their balancing skills, and it was incredible what they could squeeze into the hard rock genre."
This time you can experience Kotzen in solo format, where he will give the audience an insight into the kind of music he himself knows and fell in love with as a young man, and which he still continues to pay tribute to and rethink. The sound of Rochie Kotzen is a walk down the nostalgic rock path, where small, innovative and surprising touches spring forth.

posts.title: Destin Conrad
posts.body:
Destin Conrad plays at Pumpehuset on June 26, 2024
Destin Conrad is a sensual R&B singer from Tampa, Florida. He got his start in the music industry when he started making Vines and gained more than 1 million followers on the platform. A few years later, he co-wrote Kehlani's album "It Was Good Until It Wasn't", which went #2 on Billboard.
Destin's debut project, "COLORWAY", was released in 2021 and has hit more than 100 million streams. He spent most of 2022 on the road supporting Syd and Kehlani on their tours and then released his second project, "SATIN", which was just as successful as "COLORWAY". Fader has described his catalog as "lush, intimate earworms infused with a gentle touch."
I 2023 tog Destin på sin første headliner-tour i EU og UK, hvor han udsolgte shows i Amsterdam, Paris og tre aftener i London. Han har senest udgivet "SUBMISSIVE" og "SUBMISSIVE2". Begge udgivelser består af 9 sange har har features fra Masego, Jordan Ward og Alex Isley.
Destin Conrad started 2024 with his first headline tour in the USA, where he will play in 35 cities. He then goes back to Europe and can be seen in the Pump House on 26 June 2024.

posts.title: Wos
posts.body:
Live Tonite is proud to present the Danish debut show of WOS, the Argentinian alternative rap/freestyle artist who has gone on to become one of the most important artists on the hip hop scene.
WOS, born Valentín Oliva, is an Argentinian artist known for his multifaceted talents in music, rap and performance. WOS rose to prominence in the Argentine music scene and gained widespread recognition with his debut album "Oscuro Éxtasis", which propelled him to international recognition and garnered numerous awards and accolades. With a unique blend of alternative rock, rap and elements of Argentine folklore, WOS continues to push boundaries with its distinct sound and captivating performances. As a versatile artist and cultural personality, WOS continues to be a driving force in shaping the modern music landscape in Argentina and beyond. Two and a half years after the release of the "Oscuro Extasis" album, WOS presents "DESCARTABLE" - his third studio album. In this work, he surprises us again with a fusion of sounds that achieves an impressive sound that deepens his journey through alternative rock, intertwining with genres such as folklore, synthetic pop from the 80s, emphasizing his generational crossover, while not ignoring his origins in rap, and the most classic rock and roll, which lies between the most characteristic elements of Argentine music and Latin American rock from the 90s.
On June 20, fans in Denmark finally get the chance to experience the energy and excitement of his show, which starts at 21.00 in Pumpehuset, Copenhagen (all ages are welcome, no refunds). Get your tickets now.

posts.title: Babasónicos Ekstrakoncert
posts.body:
90s rock from Argentina
After a successful European tour with sold-out shows and enthusiastic audiences in 2023, Babasonicos is ready to captivate audiences across Europe once again.
Known for their unique performances, the Argentinian rock band is ready to embark on another exciting journey through the continent's vibrant cities and cultural hubs.
With their unique blend of rock, pop and experimental sounds, the Babasonicos have gained a dedicated following that spans national borders and transcends language barriers.
Their dynamic stage presence combined with their eclectic repertoire of hits spanning decades promises an unforgettable experience for fans old and new.

posts.title: No Te Va Gustar
posts.body:
Latin American genre jugglers play the summer into the Pumpehuset
No Te VA Gustar celebrates 30 years of music with an epic international tour. From their humble beginnings in Uruguay in 1994 to performing to thousands in more than twenty countries, NTVG reflects on their journey. Their upcoming tour, "30 años", will be a musical milestone celebrating the timeless power of their songs.
The tour is a tribute to the camaraderie and unwavering support of passionate fans who have made the journey unforgettable. NTVG is known for their fusion of rock with reggae, folk, murga and ska influences. With 10 studio albums, one acoustic live album, five live albums, one documentary and one concert film, NTVG has earned 9 Latin Grammy nominations. Now they will be marking three decades in the industry by continuing to captivate audiences with their powerful performances. The tour will be a celebration of their illustrious career, reminding fans why NTVG remains a beloved fixture in the music scene.
Den 22. juni får fans i Danmark endelig chancen for at opleve energien og spændingen NTVG's show (for alle aldre, ingen refusion). Gå ikke glip af denne mulighed for at se et af de mest ikoniske bands i latinamerikansk musikhistorie.

posts.title: Lil Darkie
posts.body:
Der venter hidsige, eksperimenterende trap-sange, når Lil Darkie svinger forbi hovedstaden
Lil Darkie and his band, The Dark Army, travel across the Atlantic once again to play for their European fans. Lil Darkie is one of the most controversial figures in recent hip-hop. He has built a unique style, combining everything from country and R&B to noise and older hip-hop - a cocktail that has often been described as 'trap metal'. With his furious flow and heavy beats, Lil Darkie delivers some of the most intense concerts on the hip-hop scene. His style is extremely experimental and his lyrics extremely provocative, so the listener has to hold his tongue when Lil Darkie channels his anger into his songs.

posts.title: Soulfly
posts.body:
Max Cavaleras band, Soulfly, vælter Pumpehuset 30. juli 2024
Soulfly er et amerikansk thrash metal-band, der blev dannet af Max Cavalera i 1997 efter han trådte ud af det indflydelsesrige brasilianske thrash-metal-band Sepultura.
Soulfly er kendt for deres unikke fusion af thrash metal med elementer fra groove metal og nu metal. Gennem årene har Soulfly udgivet en række albums, der viser Max Cavaleras evne til at kombinere hårdtslående riffs med andre musikalske stilarter og inspiration fra forskellige kulturer.
Debutalbummet, "Soulfly", udkom i 1998 og etablerede hurtigt bandet som et stærkt navn på metalscenen. Albummet er præget af en rå og energisk lyd, som er blevet et kendetegn for dem. Gennem deres karriere har Soulfly fortsat med at udvikle deres lyd og har udforsket forskellige temaer, lige fra personlige kampe og uligheder i samfundet til spirituelle og religiøse emner.
Bandet har oplevet flere line-up ændringer gennem årene, men Max Cavalera har været en konstant drivkraft og kreativ leder. Med albums som "Primitive" (2000), "Dark Ages" (2005) og "Ritual" (2018) har Soulfly bevist, at de kan forny sig selv og forblive relevante i en evigt skiftende musikscene. Deres koncerter er kendt for deres intense energi og interaktion med publikum, hvilket har sikret dem en loyal fanbase over hele verden.
Soulfly fortsætter med at være en betydningsfuld aktør inden for metalgenren, og Max Cavaleras vision om at skabe musik, der bryder grænser og udforsker nye territorier, lever videre gennem bandets vedvarende kreative indsats. Dette kan man blandt andet høre på bandets seneste album ’’Totem’’ fra 2022.
Gå ikke glip af en aften med ægte thrash metal og oplev Soulfly live i Pumpehuset 30. juli 2024

posts.title: Electric Sun Fest
posts.body:
Two days of record sales, obscurities and tattoos
Graven Tattoo presents Electric Sun Fest, which for the first time takes place in the iconic and historic Pumpehuset and Byhaven. Electric Sun Fest is a two-day tattoo convention and festival with tattoos, stalls, music and food in the heart of Copenhagen. There will be live music during the days in Byhaven, as well as a bazaar with record sales, obscurities and unique items. In Sort Sal, there will be a tattoo convention during the day and in the evening the crown hall will be transformed into concerts from the Danish scene's top rock bands.
Friday: DKK 240.
Saturday: DKK 240.
Earlybird partout: DKK 420.
There is free entry to Byhaven on both days.
Tickets are valid for the tattoo convention and concerts in Pumpehuset.

posts.title: Ari Abdul
posts.body:
A strongly alternative pop evening awaits in August
Ari Abdul is ready to enchant Pumpehuset with dark alternative pop when she comes to Copenhagen on August 12, 2024. Raised in Brooklyn, New York and with an upbringing marked by various musical influences, Ari Abdul has found her own unique sound and style. Her Ecuadorian mother loved Latin American music, her Costa Rican/Palestinian father introduced her to classic rock, and her brothers were into hip-hop and metal.
Music soon became an additional language for the young singer, but it was many years before she dared to share her voice and talent with the world. In 2021, however, the spark was ignited and from there things went strong. In 2022 Ari released her debut single 'Babydoll' followed by the sped-up version 'Babydoll (Speed)'. Both versions achieved viral success with over 128 million views. global streams, 400 million TikTok views and 420,000 TikTok creations.
Mixing reverb-heavy waves inspired by shoegaze artists like The Neighborhood and Lana Del Rey, Ari Abdul has found his very own unique sound. Her alternative style, appealing visual identity and modern approach to music have already secured her fans worldwide. Experience the young and budding star, Ari Abdul, when she comes to the Pumphouse on August 12, 2024!

posts.title: Electric Sun Fest
posts.body:
Two days of record sales, obscurities and tattoos
Graven Tattoo presents Electric Sun Fest, which for the first time takes place in the iconic and historic Pumpehuset and Byhaven. Electric Sun Fest is a two-day tattoo convention and festival with tattoos, stalls, music and food in the heart of Copenhagen.
