posts.title: Blonde Redhead
posts.body:
Indiepop legends give a concert in Copenhagen
Amerikanske Blonde Redhead gæster Pumpehuset den 13. august med numrene fra deres nye stærke album ”Sit Down for Dinner”. Supporten leveres af koreansk-danske Meejah.
For four decades, Blonde Redhead has cultivated their own unique expression somewhere between crackling noise rock, bittersweet indie pop and cinematic-melodramatic art pop, which has secured them a loyal and dedicated audience and a reputation as one of modern indie pop's most style-creating bands.
Blonde Redhead was formed in 1993 by singer, guitarist and keyboardist Kazu Makino and twin brothers Simone (drums and keys) and Amedeo Pace, who sings and plays guitar, bass and keyboards. At the beginning, they found musical inspiration in no wave rock and groups such as My Bloody Valentine and Fugazi, but very telling of their wide-ranging artistic vision, avant-garde filmmakers such as Jean-Luc Godard and Pier Paolo Pasolini were equally great sources of inspiration.
Up through the 90s they released four excellent albums (two of them via Sonic Youth drummer Steve Shelley's label Smells Like Records), but with 2000's masterful "Melody of Certain Damaged Lemons" they took an artistic quantum leap. Here, Blonde Redhead seriously abandons noise rock's bursting bursts to cultivate delicate songwriting instead, unfolding in a sophisticated and alluring art pop universe. A development they continued on the brilliant sequel “Misery Is a Butterfly” (2004); a beautiful, image-creating, chamber pop and gothic gloomy album with strings, synths and piano, which is considered one of the best indie pop albums of the 00s. In the following years, Blonde Redhead released the albums "23", "Penny Sparkle" and "Barragán", and as a special Danish curl, they provided the soundtrack for the Jørgen Leth tribute film "The Commentator". In 2017, the EP "3 O'Clock" was released, with which they toured, after which there was silence about the group for several years.
In 2022, however, they started playing live again, after which they released their tenth studio album "Sit Down for Dinner" in autumn 2023, which was well received by critics. Pitchfork, for example, gave it a grade of 7.5 and called it "their warmest, most welcoming music yet", while Mojo wrote that "Blonde Redhead address their potent heartaches with renewed grace and strength".
Blonde Redhead has previously given concerts in Aarhus and Copenhagen and performed several times at Roskilde Festival - most recently in 2018, where GAFFA awarded them with four solid stars. This summer they finally return when they perform the new tracks from "Sit Down for Dinner" and classics from the back catalog on 13 August in Pumpehuset.

posts.title: Boldy James + The Alchemist
posts.body:
Insanely strong hip-hop duo hits Copenhagen
It will be an evening for the hip-hop history books when one of the world's greatest producers crosses paths with one of the most unique underground voices for a concert in Pumpehuset on 1 August.
The Alchemist is rightfully one of the world's most sought-after hip-hop producers. He is eternally relevant and is constantly involved in new projects - most recently together with Earl Sweatshirt on the album "Voir Dire". In the past he has produced Kendrick Lamar, Mobb Deep, Freddie Gibbs, Travis Scott, Nas, Lil Wayne and many, many more. Alchemist has also been the official tour DJ for Eminem and Action Bronson, and now Copenhagen gets the opportunity to experience the heavyweight up close. Yeah, maybe we'll even get to see Alchemist rap.
Boldy James from Detroit released his first album "My 1st Chemistry Set" in 2013, and it was produced in its entirety by Alchemist. The two met via Boldy's cousin Chucky English, and together, in addition to Boldy's debut, they have made "The Price of Tea in China" and "Bo Jackson". The latter two are both modern hipohp classics. It is rumored that Boldy James is on the verge of releasing the record "Drug Dilla" with beats from the late J. Dilla.
Live, the duo is a phenomenal experience and the oven is set for a more or less legendary evening in Pumpehuset.

posts.title: Cro-Mags
posts.body:
Hardcore punk legends occupy the Pumpehuset in August
With roots deeply rooted in New York City's motley punk scene, Cro-Mags have been pioneering hardcore punk for decades. Formed in 1981 by charismatic frontman Harley Flanagan, the band has cemented its reputation as one of the most influential groups in punk history.
With their signature sound, Cro-Mags have set the standard for what hardcore punk music can be. Their 1986 debut album, "The Age of Quarrel", stands as a monument to the band's raw talent and indomitable spirit. Still hailed as a classic of the genre, the album is an uncompromising display of punk's raw power and musical prowess.
But Cro-Mags is more than just music. Their lyrics, which often challenge society's norms and political status quo, have made them voices for a generation of marginalized and frustrated youth. Through their music, they manage to express the pain, anger and hope of those who feel neglected by society.
Even after decades on the scene, Cro-Mags continue to shape the punk landscape and inspire new generations of musicians and fans. Their legacy as pioneers in hardcore punk is indisputable, and their influence will continue to be felt for a long time to come. Cro-Mags is not just a band; they are a movement, an energy, an unadulterated manifestation of the indomitable spirit of punk.

posts.title: Ty Segall
posts.body:
Legendary garage rocker gives exclusive solo concert with powerful new songs
Ty Segall is unique on the American garage rock scene, known for his exuberant work ethic, which since 2008 has resulted in well over 20 albums under his own name - and this does not count side projects and split albums!
Because there is such a short time from thought to action with the American unique, his latest album "Three Bells", which was released in January 2024, is something very special in an otherwise colorful and wide-ranging discography.
Segall has thus worked on it for two years – an unheard of long time in the making for the restless musician. On the other hand, the 65-minute long double album is also one of his most ambitious and absolutely best releases, showing his boundless musical creativity and superb songwriting range.
Here is straight-on garage rock, cool fuzz chords and sparkling stoner rock, but also more subdued moments and proggy compositions that send loving greetings to such different names as The Beatles, Love, Led Zeppelin, Funkadelic and Frank Zappa.
"Three Bells" has also received bundles of praise from critics. Pitchfork gave it a nice grade of 7.8 and characterized it as "an ambitious, uncanny, joyfully unpredictable album that invites you to get lost within its house-of-mirrors design". Paste Magazine gave 8 out of 10 stars for "more than an hour of his musical stream of consciousness roaming wild and free", while Uncut gave 4.5 out of 5 stars and wrote: "It's brilliantly recorded, pristine and perfectly imperfect".
Now Ty Segall is going on tour with the new tracks and classics from the back catalogue, and on this occasion he is once again touring Denmark. On 19 August, the legendary garage rocker can thus be experienced in a very special setup in Pumpehuset, where he gives an exclusive acoustic solo concert for his Danish proselytes.

posts.title: Terror + Lifesick
posts.body:
It stands on high-energy, neck-breaking hardcore in the Pump House on July 28, when the ever-wild Terror swing by.
Los Angeles powerhouse band Terror has always been a name synonymous with hardcore. Since their inception in 2002, the band has displayed an unwavering dedication that no one else in the scene can match. With six studio albums, a number of live albums, splits, compilations and EPs behind them, the scene veterans are now getting ready to release their new full-length album 'Total Retaliation'. Slated for release on September 28, the new album is produced by Fit For An Autopsy's Will Putney (Thy Art Is Murder, Body Count, Knocked Loose) and is the band's first new material since last year's 'The Walls Will Fall' EP. With a playing time of just under 30 minutes, 'Total Retaliation' is a concise but intense message about resistance in a world that rarely inspires anything else. It is a helping hand to the disillusioned and a strong middle finger to the authorities who are tearing society apart as we know it. As the band's seventh full-length studio album, it serves as yet another example of why Terror has not only endured, but remained at the top of their game for over 15 years.
Lifesick
Formed in Fredericia in 2015, Lifesick creates brutal and brutally honest songs with lyrics inspired by the turbulent nature of life. Musically influenced by Swedish death metal, Lifesick's authentic and explosive mix of crushing tones and modern breakdowns creates an uncompromising sound and vision.

As the band's seventh full-length studio album, it serves as yet another example of why Terror has not only endured, but remained at the top of their game for over 15 years.
Lifesick
Formed in Fredericia in 2015, Lifesick creates brutal and brutally honest songs with lyrics inspired by the turbulent nature of life. Musically influenced by Swedish death metal, Lifesick's authentic and explosive mix of crushing tones and modern breakdowns creates an uncompromising sound and vision.

posts.title: Soulfly
posts.body:
Max Cavaleras band, Soulfly, vælter Pumpehuset 30. juli 2024
Soulfly er et amerikansk thrash metal-band, der blev dannet af Max Cavalera i 1997 efter han trådte ud af det indflydelsesrige brasilianske thrash-metal-band Sepultura.
Soulfly er kendt for deres unikke fusion af thrash metal med elementer fra groove metal og nu metal. Gennem årene har Soulfly udgivet en række albums, der viser Max Cavaleras evne til at kombinere hårdtslående riffs med andre musikalske stilarter og inspiration fra forskellige kulturer.
Debutalbummet, "Soulfly", udkom i 1998 og etablerede hurtigt bandet som et stærkt navn på metalscenen. Albummet er præget af en rå og energisk lyd, som er blevet et kendetegn for dem. Gennem deres karriere har Soulfly fortsat med at udvikle deres lyd og har udforsket forskellige temaer, lige fra personlige kampe og uligheder i samfundet til spirituelle og religiøse emner.
Bandet har oplevet flere line-up ændringer gennem årene, men Max Cavalera har været en konstant drivkraft og kreativ leder. Med albums som "Primitive" (2000), "Dark Ages" (2005) og "Ritual" (2018) har Soulfly bevist, at de kan forny sig selv og forblive relevante i en evigt skiftende musikscene. Deres koncerter er kendt for deres intense energi og interaktion med publikum, hvilket har sikret dem en loyal fanbase over hele verden.
Soulfly fortsætter med at være en betydningsfuld aktør inden for metalgenren, og Max Cavaleras vision om at skabe musik, der bryder grænser og udforsker nye territorier, lever videre gennem bandets vedvarende kreative indsats. Dette kan man blandt andet høre på bandets seneste album ’’Totem’’ fra 2022.
Gå ikke glip af en aften med ægte thrash metal og oplev Soulfly live i Pumpehuset 30. juli 2024

posts.title: Blonde Redhead
posts.body:
Indiepop legends give a concert in Copenhagen
Amerikanske Blonde Redhead gæster Pumpehuset den 13. august med numrene fra deres nye stærke album ”Sit Down for Dinner”. Supporten leveres af koreansk-danske Meejah.
For four decades, Blonde Redhead has cultivated their own unique expression somewhere between crackling noise rock, bittersweet indie pop and cinematic-melodramatic art pop, which has secured them a loyal and dedicated audience and a reputation as one of modern indie pop's most style-creating bands.
Blonde Redhead was formed in 1993 by singer, guitarist and keyboardist Kazu Makino and twin brothers Simone (drums and keys) and Amedeo Pace, who sings and plays guitar, bass and keyboards. At the beginning, they found musical inspiration in no wave rock and groups such as My Bloody Valentine and Fugazi, but very telling of their wide-ranging artistic vision, avant-garde filmmakers such as Jean-Luc Godard and Pier Paolo Pasolini were equally great sources of inspiration.
Up through the 90s they released four excellent albums (two of them via Sonic Youth drummer Steve Shelley's label Smells Like Records), but with 2000's masterful "Melody of Certain Damaged Lemons" they took an artistic quantum leap. Here, Blonde Redhead seriously abandons noise rock's bursting bursts to cultivate delicate songwriting instead, unfolding in a sophisticated and alluring art pop universe. A development they continued on the brilliant sequel “Misery Is a Butterfly” (2004); a beautiful, image-creating, chamber pop and gothic gloomy album with strings, synths and piano, which is considered one of the best indie pop albums of the 00s. In the following years, Blonde Redhead released the albums "23", "Penny Sparkle" and "Barragán", and as a special Danish curl, they provided the soundtrack for the Jørgen Leth tribute film "The Commentator". In 2017, the EP "3 O'Clock" was released, with which they toured, after which there was silence about the group for several years.
In 2022, however, they started playing live again, after which they released their tenth studio album "Sit Down for Dinner" in autumn 2023, which was well received by critics. Pitchfork, for example, gave it a grade of 7.5 and called it "their warmest, most welcoming music yet", while Mojo wrote that "Blonde Redhead address their potent heartaches with renewed grace and strength".
Blonde Redhead has previously given concerts in Aarhus and Copenhagen and performed several times at Roskilde Festival - most recently in 2018, where GAFFA awarded them with four solid stars. This summer they finally return when they perform the new tracks from "Sit Down for Dinner" and classics from the back catalog on 13 August in Pumpehuset.

posts.title: Ari Abdul
posts.body:
A strongly alternative pop evening awaits in August
Ari Abdul is ready to enchant Pumpehuset with dark alternative pop when she comes to Copenhagen on August 12, 2024. Raised in Brooklyn, New York and with an upbringing marked by various musical influences, Ari Abdul has found her own unique sound and style. Her Ecuadorian mother loved Latin American music, her Costa Rican/Palestinian father introduced her to classic rock, and her brothers were into hip-hop and metal.
Music soon became an additional language for the young singer, but it was many years before she dared to share her voice and talent with the world. In 2021, however, the spark was ignited and from there things went strong. In 2022 Ari released her debut single 'Babydoll' followed by the sped-up version 'Babydoll (Speed)'. Both versions achieved viral success with over 128 million views. global streams, 400 million TikTok views and 420,000 TikTok creations.
Mixing reverb-heavy waves inspired by shoegaze artists like The Neighborhood and Lana Del Rey, Ari Abdul has found his very own unique sound. Her alternative style, appealing visual identity and modern approach to music have already secured her fans worldwide. Experience the young and budding star, Ari Abdul, when she comes to the Pumphouse on August 12, 2024!

posts.title: Cro-Mags
posts.body:
Hardcore punk legends occupy the Pumpehuset in August
With roots deeply rooted in New York City's motley punk scene, Cro-Mags have been pioneering hardcore punk for decades. Formed in 1981 by charismatic frontman Harley Flanagan, the band has cemented its reputation as one of the most influential groups in punk history.
With their signature sound, Cro-Mags have set the standard for what hardcore punk music can be. Their 1986 debut album, "The Age of Quarrel", stands as a monument to the band's raw talent and indomitable spirit. Still hailed as a classic of the genre, the album is an uncompromising display of punk's raw power and musical prowess.
But Cro-Mags is more than just music. Their lyrics, which often challenge society's norms and political status quo, have made them voices for a generation of marginalized and frustrated youth. Through their music, they manage to express the pain, anger and hope of those who feel neglected by society.
Even after decades on the scene, Cro-Mags continue to shape the punk landscape and inspire new generations of musicians and fans. Their legacy as pioneers in hardcore punk is indisputable, and their influence will continue to be felt for a long time to come. Cro-Mags is not just a band; they are a movement, an energy, an unadulterated manifestation of the indomitable spirit of punk.

posts.title: Terror + Lifesick
posts.body:
It stands on high-energy, neck-breaking hardcore in the Pump House on July 28, when the ever-wild Terror swing by.
Los Angeles powerhouse band Terror has always been a name synonymous with hardcore. Since their inception in 2002, the band has displayed an unwavering dedication that no one else in the scene can match. With six studio albums, a number of live albums, splits, compilations and EPs behind them, the scene veterans are now getting ready to release their new full-length album 'Total Retaliation'. Slated for release on September 28, the new album is produced by Fit For An Autopsy's Will Putney (Thy Art Is Murder, Body Count, Knocked Loose) and is the band's first new material since last year's 'The Walls Will Fall' EP. With a playing time of just under 30 minutes, 'Total Retaliation' is a concise but intense message about resistance in a world that rarely inspires anything else. It is a helping hand to the disillusioned and a strong middle finger to the authorities who are tearing society apart as we know it. As the band's seventh full-length studio album, it serves as yet another example of why Terror has not only endured, but remained at the top of their game for over 15 years.

Musically influenced by Swedish death metal, Lifesick's authentic and explosive mix of crushing tones and modern breakdowns creates an uncompromising sound and vision.

posts.title: Electric Sun Fest
posts.body:
Two days of record sales, obscurities and tattoos
Graven Tattoo presents Electric Sun Fest, which for the first time takes place in the iconic and historic Pumpehuset and Byhaven. Electric Sun Fest is a two-day tattoo convention and festival with tattoos, stalls, music and food in the heart of Copenhagen. There will be live music during the days in Byhaven, as well as a bazaar with record sales, obscurities and unique items. In Sort Sal, there will be a tattoo convention during the day and in the evening the crown hall will be transformed into concerts from the Danish scene's top rock bands.
Friday: DKK 240.
Saturday: DKK 240.
Earlybird partout: DKK 420.
There is free entry to Byhaven on both days.
Tickets are valid for the tattoo convention and concerts in Pumpehuset.

posts.title: Ty Segall
posts.body:
Legendary garage rocker gives exclusive solo concert with powerful new songs
Ty Segall is unique on the American garage rock scene, known for his exuberant work ethic, which since 2008 has resulted in well over 20 albums under his own name - and this does not count side projects and split albums!
Because there is such a short time from thought to action with the American unique, his latest album "Three Bells", which was released in January 2024, is something very special in an otherwise colorful and wide-ranging discography.
Segall has thus worked on it for two years – an unheard of long time in the making for the restless musician. On the other hand, the 65-minute long double album is also one of his most ambitious and absolutely best releases, showing his boundless musical creativity and superb songwriting range.
Here is straight-on garage rock, cool fuzz chords and sparkling stoner rock, but also more subdued moments and proggy compositions that send loving greetings to such different names as The Beatles, Love, Led Zeppelin, Funkadelic and Frank Zappa.
"Three Bells" has also received bundles of praise from critics. Pitchfork gave it a nice grade of 7.8 and characterized it as "an ambitious, uncanny, joyfully unpredictable album that invites you to get lost within its house-of-mirrors design". Paste Magazine gave 8 out of 10 stars for "more than an hour of his musical stream of consciousness roaming wild and free", while Uncut gave 4.5 out of 5 stars and wrote: "It's brilliantly recorded, pristine and perfectly imperfect".
Now Ty Segall is going on tour with the new tracks and classics from the back catalogue, and on this occasion he is once again touring Denmark. On 19 August, the legendary garage rocker can thus be experienced in a very special setup in Pumpehuset, where he gives an exclusive acoustic solo concert for his Danish proselytes.

posts.title: Boldy James + The Alchemist
posts.body:
Insanely strong hip-hop duo hits Copenhagen
It will be an evening for the hip-hop history books when one of the world's greatest producers crosses paths with one of the most unique underground voices for a concert in Pumpehuset on 1 August.
The Alchemist is rightfully one of the world's most sought-after hip-hop producers. He is eternally relevant and is constantly involved in new projects - most recently together with Earl Sweatshirt on the album "Voir Dire". In the past he has produced Kendrick Lamar, Mobb Deep, Freddie Gibbs, Travis Scott, Nas, Lil Wayne and many, many more. Alchemist has also been the official tour DJ for Eminem and Action Bronson, and now Copenhagen gets the opportunity to experience the heavyweight up close. Yeah, maybe we'll even get to see Alchemist rap.
Boldy James from Detroit released his first album "My 1st Chemistry Set" in 2013, and it was produced in its entirety by Alchemist. The two met via Boldy's cousin Chucky English, and together, in addition to Boldy's debut, they have made "The Price of Tea in China" and "Bo Jackson". The latter two are both modern hipohp classics. It is rumored that Boldy James is on the verge of releasing the record "Drug Dilla" with beats from the late J. Dilla.
Live, the duo is a phenomenal experience and the oven is set for a more or less legendary evening in Pumpehuset.

Ty Segall is unique on the American garage rock scene, known for his exuberant work ethic, which since 2008 has resulted in well over 20 albums under his own name - and this does not count side projects and split albums!
Because there is such a short time from thought to action with the American unique, his latest album "Three Bells", which was released in January 2024, is something very special in an otherwise colorful and wide-ranging discography.
Segall has thus worked on it for two years – an unheard of long time in the making for the restless musician. On the other hand, the 65-minute long double album is also one of his most ambitious and absolutely best releases, showing his boundless musical creativity and superb songwriting range.
Here is straight-on garage rock, cool fuzz chords and sparkling stoner rock, but also more subdued moments and proggy compositions that send loving greetings to such different names as The Beatles, Love, Led Zeppelin, Funkadelic and Frank Zappa.
"Three Bells" has also received bundles of praise from critics. Pitchfork gave it a nice grade of 7.8 and characterized it as "an ambitious, uncanny, joyfully unpredictable album that invites you to get lost within its house-of-mirrors design". Paste Magazine gave 8 out of 10 stars for "more than an hour of his musical stream of consciousness roaming wild and free", while Uncut gave 4.5 out of 5 stars and wrote: "It's brilliantly recorded, pristine and perfectly imperfect".
Now Ty Segall is going on tour with the new tracks and classics from the back catalogue, and on this occasion he is once again touring Denmark. On 19 August, the legendary garage rocker can thus be experienced in a very special setup in Pumpehuset, where he gives an exclusive acoustic solo concert for his Danish proselytes.

posts.title: Cro-Mags
posts.body:
Hardcore punk legends occupy the Pumpehuset in August
With roots deeply rooted in New York City's motley punk scene, Cro-Mags have been pioneering hardcore punk for decades. Formed in 1981 by charismatic frontman Harley Flanagan, the band has cemented its reputation as one of the most influential groups in punk history.
With their signature sound, Cro-Mags have set the standard for what hardcore punk music can be. Their 1986 debut album, "The Age of Quarrel", stands as a monument to the band's raw talent and indomitable spirit. Still hailed as a classic of the genre, the album is an uncompromising display of punk's raw power and musical prowess.
But Cro-Mags is more than just music. Their lyrics, which often challenge society's norms and political status quo, have made them voices for a generation of marginalized and frustrated youth. Through their music, they manage to express the pain, anger and hope of those who feel neglected by society.
Even after decades on the scene, Cro-Mags continue to shape the punk landscape and inspire new generations of musicians and fans. Their legacy as pioneers in hardcore punk is indisputable, and their influence will continue to be felt for a long time to come. Cro-Mags is not just a band; they are a movement, an energy, an unadulterated manifestation of the indomitable spirit of punk.

posts.title: Terror + Lifesick
posts.body:
It stands on high-energy, neck-breaking hardcore in the Pump House on July 28, when the ever-wild Terror swing by.
Los Angeles powerhouse band Terror has always been a name synonymous with hardcore. Since their inception in 2002, the band has displayed an unwavering dedication that no one else in the scene can match. With six studio albums, a number of live albums, splits, compilations and EPs behind them, the scene veterans are now getting ready to release their new full-length album 'Total Retaliation'. Slated for release on September 28, the new album is produced by Fit For An Autopsy's Will Putney (Thy Art Is Murder, Body Count, Knocked Loose) and is the band's first new material since last year's 'The Walls Will Fall' EP. With a playing time of just under 30 minutes, 'Total Retaliation' is a concise but intense message about resistance in a world that rarely inspires anything else. It is a helping hand to the disillusioned and a strong middle finger to the authorities who are tearing society apart as we know it. As the band's seventh full-length studio album, it serves as yet another example of why Terror has not only endured, but remained at the top of their game for over 15 years.
Lifesick
Formed in Fredericia in 2015, Lifesick creates brutal and brutally honest songs with lyrics inspired by the turbulent nature of life. Musically influenced by Swedish death metal, Lifesick's authentic and explosive mix of crushing tones and modern breakdowns creates an uncompromising sound and vision.

posts.title: Boldy James + The Alchemist
posts.body:
Insanely strong hip-hop duo hits Copenhagen
It will be an evening for the hip-hop history books when one of the world's greatest producers crosses paths with one of the most unique underground voices for a concert in Pumpehuset on 1 August.
The Alchemist is rightfully one of the world's most sought-after hip-hop producers. He is eternally relevant and is constantly involved in new projects - most recently together with Earl Sweatshirt on the album "Voir Dire". In the past he has produced Kendrick Lamar, Mobb Deep, Freddie Gibbs, Travis Scott, Nas, Lil Wayne and many, many more. Alchemist has also been the official tour DJ for Eminem and Action Bronson, and now Copenhagen gets the opportunity to experience the heavyweight up close. Yeah, maybe we'll even get to see Alchemist rap.
Boldy James from Detroit released his first album "My 1st Chemistry Set" in 2013, and it was produced in its entirety by Alchemist. The two met via Boldy's cousin Chucky English, and together, in addition to Boldy's debut, they have made "The Price of Tea in China" and "Bo Jackson". The latter two are both modern hipohp classics. It is rumored that Boldy James is on the verge of releasing the record "Drug Dilla" with beats from the late J. Dilla.
Live, the duo is a phenomenal experience and the oven is set for a more or less legendary evening in Pumpehuset.

posts.title: Soulfly
posts.body:
Max Cavaleras band, Soulfly, vælter Pumpehuset 30. juli 2024
Soulfly er et amerikansk thrash metal-band, der blev dannet af Max Cavalera i 1997 efter han trådte ud af det indflydelsesrige brasilianske thrash-metal-band Sepultura.
Soulfly er kendt for deres unikke fusion af thrash metal med elementer fra groove metal og nu metal. Gennem årene har Soulfly udgivet en række albums, der viser Max Cavaleras evne til at kombinere hårdtslående riffs med andre musikalske stilarter og inspiration fra forskellige kulturer.
Debutalbummet, "Soulfly", udkom i 1998 og etablerede hurtigt bandet som et stærkt navn på metalscenen. Albummet er præget af en rå og energisk lyd, som er blevet et kendetegn for dem. Gennem deres karriere har Soulfly fortsat med at udvikle deres lyd og har udforsket forskellige temaer, lige fra personlige kampe og uligheder i samfundet til spirituelle og religiøse emner.
Bandet har oplevet flere line-up ændringer gennem årene, men Max Cavalera har været en konstant drivkraft og kreativ leder. Med albums som "Primitive" (2000), "Dark Ages" (2005) og "Ritual" (2018) har Soulfly bevist, at de kan forny sig selv og forblive relevante i en evigt skiftende musikscene. Deres koncerter er kendt for deres intense energi og interaktion med publikum, hvilket har sikret dem en loyal fanbase over hele verden.
Soulfly fortsætter med at være en betydningsfuld aktør inden for metalgenren, og Max Cavaleras vision om at skabe musik, der bryder grænser og udforsker nye territorier, lever videre gennem bandets vedvarende kreative indsats. Dette kan man blandt andet høre på bandets seneste album ’’Totem’’ fra 2022.
Gå ikke glip af en aften med ægte thrash metal og oplev Soulfly live i Pumpehuset 30. juli 2024

posts.title: Ari Abdul
posts.body:
A strongly alternative pop evening awaits in August
Ari Abdul is ready to enchant Pumpehuset with dark alternative pop when she comes to Copenhagen on August 12, 2024. Raised in Brooklyn, New York and with an upbringing marked by various musical influences, Ari Abdul has found her own unique sound and style. Her Ecuadorian mother loved Latin American music, her Costa Rican/Palestinian father introduced her to classic rock, and her brothers were into hip-hop and metal.
Music soon became an additional language for the young singer, but it was many years before she dared to share her voice and talent with the world. In 2021, however, the spark was ignited and from there things went strong. In 2022 Ari released her debut single 'Babydoll' followed by the sped-up version 'Babydoll (Speed)'. Both versions achieved viral success with over 128 million views. global streams, 400 million TikTok views and 420,000 TikTok creations.
Mixing reverb-heavy waves inspired by shoegaze artists like The Neighborhood and Lana Del Rey, Ari Abdul has found his very own unique sound. Her alternative style, appealing visual identity and modern approach to music have already secured her fans worldwide. Experience the young and budding star, Ari Abdul, when she comes to the Pumphouse on August 12, 2024!

posts.title: Blonde Redhead
posts.body:
Indiepop legends give a concert in Copenhagen
Amerikanske Blonde Redhead gæster Pumpehuset den 13. august med numrene fra deres nye stærke album ”Sit Down for Dinner”. Supporten leveres af koreansk-danske Meejah.
For four decades, Blonde Redhead has cultivated their own unique expression somewhere between crackling noise rock, bittersweet indie pop and cinematic-melodramatic art pop, which has secured them a loyal and dedicated audience and a reputation as one of modern indie pop's most style-creating bands.
Blonde Redhead was formed in 1993 by singer, guitarist and keyboardist Kazu Makino and twin brothers Simone (drums and keys) and Amedeo Pace, who sings and plays guitar, bass and keyboards. At the beginning, they found musical inspiration in no wave rock and groups such as My Bloody Valentine and Fugazi, but very telling of their wide-ranging artistic vision, avant-garde filmmakers such as Jean-Luc Godard and Pier Paolo Pasolini were equally great sources of inspiration.
Up through the 90s they released four excellent albums (two of them via Sonic Youth drummer Steve Shelley's label Smells Like Records), but with 2000's masterful "Melody of Certain Damaged Lemons" they took an artistic quantum leap. Here, Blonde Redhead seriously abandons noise rock's bursting bursts to cultivate delicate songwriting instead, unfolding in a sophisticated and alluring art pop universe. A development they continued on the brilliant sequel “Misery Is a Butterfly” (2004); a beautiful, image-creating, chamber pop and gothic gloomy album with strings, synths and piano, which is considered one of the best indie pop albums of the 00s. In the following years, Blonde Redhead released the albums "23", "Penny Sparkle" and "Barragán", and as a special Danish curl, they provided the soundtrack for the Jørgen Leth tribute film "The Commentator". In 2017, the EP "3 O'Clock" was released, with which they toured, after which there was silence about the group for several years.
In 2022, however, they started playing live again, after which they released their tenth studio album "Sit Down for Dinner" in autumn 2023, which was well received by critics. Pitchfork, for example, gave it a grade of 7.5 and called it "their warmest, most welcoming music yet", while Mojo wrote that "Blonde Redhead address their potent heartaches with renewed grace and strength".
Blonde Redhead has previously given concerts in Aarhus and Copenhagen and performed several times at Roskilde Festival - most recently in 2018, where GAFFA awarded them with four solid stars. This summer they finally return when they perform the new tracks from "Sit Down for Dinner" and classics from the back catalog on 13 August in Pumpehuset.

As the band's seventh full-length studio album, it serves as yet another example of why Terror has not only endured, but remained at the top of their game for over 15 years.
Lifesick
Formed in Fredericia in 2015, Lifesick creates brutal and brutally honest songs with lyrics inspired by the turbulent nature of life. Musically influenced by Swedish death metal, Lifesick's authentic and explosive mix of crushing tones and modern breakdowns creates an uncompromising sound and vision.

posts.title: Cro-Mags
posts.body:
Hardcore punk legends occupy the Pumpehuset in August
With roots deeply rooted in New York City's motley punk scene, Cro-Mags have been pioneering hardcore punk for decades. Formed in 1981 by charismatic frontman Harley Flanagan, the band has cemented its reputation as one of the most influential groups in punk history.
With their signature sound, Cro-Mags have set the standard for what hardcore punk music can be. Their 1986 debut album, "The Age of Quarrel", stands as a monument to the band's raw talent and indomitable spirit. Still hailed as a classic of the genre, the album is an uncompromising display of punk's raw power and musical prowess.
But Cro-Mags is more than just music. Their lyrics, which often challenge society's norms and political status quo, have made them voices for a generation of marginalized and frustrated youth. Through their music, they manage to express the pain, anger and hope of those who feel neglected by society.
Even after decades on the scene, Cro-Mags continue to shape the punk landscape and inspire new generations of musicians and fans. Their legacy as pioneers in hardcore punk is indisputable, and their influence will continue to be felt for a long time to come. Cro-Mags is not just a band; they are a movement, an energy, an unadulterated manifestation of the indomitable spirit of punk.

posts.title: Ty Segall
posts.body:

Ty Segall is unique on the American garage rock scene, known for his exuberant work ethic, which since 2008 has resulted in well over 20 albums under his own name - and this does not count side projects and split albums!
Because there is such a short time from thought to action with the American unique, his latest album "Three Bells", which was released in January 2024, is something very special in an otherwise colorful and wide-ranging discography.
Segall has thus worked on it for two years – an unheard of long time in the making for the restless musician. On the other hand, the 65-minute long double album is also one of his most ambitious and absolutely best releases, showing his boundless musical creativity and superb songwriting range.
Here is straight-on garage rock, cool fuzz chords and sparkling stoner rock, but also more subdued moments and proggy compositions that send loving greetings to such different names as The Beatles, Love, Led Zeppelin, Funkadelic and Frank Zappa.
"Three Bells" has also received bundles of praise from critics. Pitchfork gave it a nice grade of 7.8 and characterized it as "an ambitious, uncanny, joyfully unpredictable album that invites you to get lost within its house-of-mirrors design". Paste Magazine gave 8 out of 10 stars for "more than an hour of his musical stream of consciousness roaming wild and free", while Uncut gave 4.5 out of 5 stars and wrote: "It's brilliantly recorded, pristine and perfectly imperfect".
Now Ty Segall is going on tour with the new tracks and classics from the back catalogue, and on this occasion he is once again touring Denmark. On 19 August, the legendary garage rocker can thus be experienced in a very special setup in Pumpehuset, where he gives an exclusive acoustic solo concert for his Danish proselytes.

posts.title: Soulfly
posts.body:
Max Cavaleras band, Soulfly, vælter Pumpehuset 30. juli 2024
Soulfly er et amerikansk thrash metal-band, der blev dannet af Max Cavalera i 1997 efter han trådte ud af det indflydelsesrige brasilianske thrash-metal-band Sepultura.
Soulfly er kendt for deres unikke fusion af thrash metal med elementer fra groove metal og nu metal. Gennem årene har Soulfly udgivet en række albums, der viser Max Cavaleras evne til at kombinere hårdtslående riffs med andre musikalske stilarter og inspiration fra forskellige kulturer.
Debutalbummet, "Soulfly", udkom i 1998 og etablerede hurtigt bandet som et stærkt navn på metalscenen. Albummet er præget af en rå og energisk lyd, som er blevet et kendetegn for dem. Gennem deres karriere har Soulfly fortsat med at udvikle deres lyd og har udforsket forskellige temaer, lige fra personlige kampe og uligheder i samfundet til spirituelle og religiøse emner.
Bandet har oplevet flere line-up ændringer gennem årene, men Max Cavalera har været en konstant drivkraft og kreativ leder. Med albums som "Primitive" (2000), "Dark Ages" (2005) og "Ritual" (2018) har Soulfly bevist, at de kan forny sig selv og forblive relevante i en evigt skiftende musikscene. Deres koncerter er kendt for deres intense energi og interaktion med publikum, hvilket har sikret dem en loyal fanbase over hele verden.
Soulfly fortsætter med at være en betydningsfuld aktør inden for metalgenren, og Max Cavaleras vision om at skabe musik, der bryder grænser og udforsker nye territorier, lever videre gennem bandets vedvarende kreative indsats. Dette kan man blandt andet høre på bandets seneste album ’’Totem’’ fra 2022.
Gå ikke glip af en aften med ægte thrash metal og oplev Soulfly live i Pumpehuset 30. juli 2024

posts.title: Electric Sun Fest
posts.body:
Two days of record sales, obscurities and tattoos
Graven Tattoo presents Electric Sun Fest, which for the first time takes place in the iconic and historic Pumpehuset and Byhaven. Electric Sun Fest is a two-day tattoo convention and festival with tattoos, stalls, music and food in the heart of Copenhagen. There will be live music during the days in Byhaven, as well as a bazaar with record sales, obscurities and unique items. In Sort Sal, there will be a tattoo convention during the day and in the evening the crown hall will be transformed into concerts from the Danish scene's top rock bands.
Friday: DKK 240.
Saturday: DKK 240.
Earlybird partout: DKK 420.
There is free entry to Byhaven on both days.
Tickets are valid for the tattoo convention and concerts in Pumpehuset.

posts.title: Ari Abdul
posts.body:
A strongly alternative pop evening awaits in August
Ari Abdul is ready to enchant Pumpehuset with dark alternative pop when she comes to Copenhagen on August 12, 2024. Raised in Brooklyn, New York and with an upbringing marked by various musical influences, Ari Abdul has found her own unique sound and style. Her Ecuadorian mother loved Latin American music, her Costa Rican/Palestinian father introduced her to classic rock, and her brothers were into hip-hop and metal.
Music soon became an additional language for the young singer, but it was many years before she dared to share her voice and talent with the world. In 2021, however, the spark was ignited and from there things went strong. In 2022 Ari released her debut single 'Babydoll' followed by the sped-up version 'Babydoll (Speed)'. Both versions achieved viral success with over 128 million views. global streams, 400 million TikTok views and 420,000 TikTok creations.
Mixing reverb-heavy waves inspired by shoegaze artists like The Neighborhood and Lana Del Rey, Ari Abdul has found his very own unique sound. Her alternative style, appealing visual identity and modern approach to music have already secured her fans worldwide. Experience the young and budding star, Ari Abdul, when she comes to the Pumphouse on August 12, 2024!

posts.title: Blonde Redhead
posts.body:
Indiepop legends give a concert in Copenhagen
Amerikanske Blonde Redhead gæster Pumpehuset den 13. august med numrene fra deres nye stærke album ”Sit Down for Dinner”. Supporten leveres af koreansk-danske Meejah.
For four decades, Blonde Redhead has cultivated their own unique expression somewhere between crackling noise rock, bittersweet indie pop and cinematic-melodramatic art pop, which has secured them a loyal and dedicated audience and a reputation as one of modern indie pop's most style-creating bands.
Blonde Redhead was formed in 1993 by singer, guitarist and keyboardist Kazu Makino and twin brothers Simone (drums and keys) and Amedeo Pace, who sings and plays guitar, bass and keyboards. At the beginning, they found musical inspiration in no wave rock and groups such as My Bloody Valentine and Fugazi, but very telling of their wide-ranging artistic vision, avant-garde filmmakers such as Jean-Luc Godard and Pier Paolo Pasolini were equally great sources of inspiration.
Up through the 90s they released four excellent albums (two of them via Sonic Youth drummer Steve Shelley's label Smells Like Records), but with 2000's masterful "Melody of Certain Damaged Lemons" they took an artistic quantum leap. Here, Blonde Redhead seriously abandons noise rock's bursting bursts to cultivate delicate songwriting instead, unfolding in a sophisticated and alluring art pop universe. A development they continued on the brilliant sequel “Misery Is a Butterfly” (2004); a beautiful, image-creating, chamber pop and gothic gloomy album with strings, synths and piano, which is considered one of the best indie pop albums of the 00s. In the following years, Blonde Redhead released the albums "23", "Penny Sparkle" and "Barragán", and as a special Danish curl, they provided the soundtrack for the Jørgen Leth tribute film "The Commentator". In 2017, the EP "3 O'Clock" was released, with which they toured, after which there was silence about the group for several years.
In 2022, however, they started playing live again, after which they released their tenth studio album "Sit Down for Dinner" in autumn 2023, which was well received by critics. Pitchfork, for example, gave it a grade of 7.5 and called it "their warmest, most welcoming music yet", while Mojo wrote that "Blonde Redhead address their potent heartaches with renewed grace and strength".
Blonde Redhead has previously given concerts in Aarhus and Copenhagen and performed several times at Roskilde Festival - most recently in 2018, where GAFFA awarded them with four solid stars. This summer they finally return when they perform the new tracks from "Sit Down for Dinner" and classics from the back catalog on 13 August in Pumpehuset.

posts.title: Terror + Lifesick
posts.body:
It stands on high-energy, neck-breaking hardcore in the Pump House on July 28, when the ever-wild Terror swing by.
Los Angeles powerhouse band Terror has always been a name synonymous with hardcore. Since their inception in 2002, the band has displayed an unwavering dedication that no one else in the scene can match. With six studio albums, a number of live albums, splits, compilations and EPs behind them, the scene veterans are now getting ready to release their new full-length album 'Total Retaliation'. Slated for release on September 28, the new album is produced by Fit For An Autopsy's Will Putney (Thy Art Is Murder, Body Count, Knocked Loose) and is the band's first new material since last year's 'The Walls Will Fall' EP. With a playing time of just under 30 minutes, 'Total Retaliation' is a concise but intense message about resistance in a world that rarely inspires anything else. It is a helping hand to the disillusioned and a strong middle finger to the authorities who are tearing society apart as we know it. As the band's seventh full-length studio album, it serves as yet another example of why Terror has not only endured, but remained at the top of their game for over 15 years.

Formed in Fredericia in 2015, Lifesick creates brutal and brutally honest songs with lyrics inspired by the turbulent nature of life. Musically influenced by Swedish death metal, Lifesick's authentic and explosive mix of crushing tones and modern breakdowns creates an uncompromising sound and vision.

posts.title: Boldy James + The Alchemist
posts.body:
Insanely strong hip-hop duo hits Copenhagen
It will be an evening for the hip-hop history books when one of the world's greatest producers crosses paths with one of the most unique underground voices for a concert in Pumpehuset on 1 August.
The Alchemist is rightfully one of the world's most sought-after hip-hop producers. He is eternally relevant and is constantly involved in new projects - most recently together with Earl Sweatshirt on the album "Voir Dire". In the past he has produced Kendrick Lamar, Mobb Deep, Freddie Gibbs, Travis Scott, Nas, Lil Wayne and many, many more. Alchemist has also been the official tour DJ for Eminem and Action Bronson, and now Copenhagen gets the opportunity to experience the heavyweight up close. Yeah, maybe we'll even get to see Alchemist rap.
Boldy James from Detroit released his first album "My 1st Chemistry Set" in 2013, and it was produced in its entirety by Alchemist. The two met via Boldy's cousin Chucky English, and together, in addition to Boldy's debut, they have made "The Price of Tea in China" and "Bo Jackson". The latter two are both modern hipohp classics. It is rumored that Boldy James is on the verge of releasing the record "Drug Dilla" with beats from the late J. Dilla.
Live, the duo is a phenomenal experience and the oven is set for a more or less legendary evening in Pumpehuset.

Segall has thus worked on it for two years – an unheard of long time in the making for the restless musician. On the other hand, the 65-minute long double album is also one of his most ambitious and absolutely best releases, showing his boundless musical creativity and superb songwriting range.
Here is straight-on garage rock, cool fuzz chords and sparkling stoner rock, but also more subdued moments and proggy compositions that send loving greetings to such different names as The Beatles, Love, Led Zeppelin, Funkadelic and Frank Zappa.
"Three Bells" has also received bundles of praise from critics. Pitchfork gave it a nice grade of 7.8 and characterized it as "an ambitious, uncanny, joyfully unpredictable album that invites you to get lost within its house-of-mirrors design". Paste Magazine gave 8 out of 10 stars for "more than an hour of his musical stream of consciousness roaming wild and free", while Uncut gave 4.5 out of 5 stars and wrote: "It's brilliantly recorded, pristine and perfectly imperfect".
Now Ty Segall is going on tour with the new tracks and classics from the back catalogue, and on this occasion he is once again touring Denmark. On 19 August, the legendary garage rocker can thus be experienced in a very special setup in Pumpehuset, where he gives an exclusive acoustic solo concert for his Danish proselytes.

posts.title: Soulfly
posts.body:
Max Cavaleras band, Soulfly, vælter Pumpehuset 30. juli 2024
Soulfly er et amerikansk thrash metal-band, der blev dannet af Max Cavalera i 1997 efter han trådte ud af det indflydelsesrige brasilianske thrash-metal-band Sepultura.
Soulfly er kendt for deres unikke fusion af thrash metal med elementer fra groove metal og nu metal. Gennem årene har Soulfly udgivet en række albums, der viser Max Cavaleras evne til at kombinere hårdtslående riffs med andre musikalske stilarter og inspiration fra forskellige kulturer.
Debutalbummet, "Soulfly", udkom i 1998 og etablerede hurtigt bandet som et stærkt navn på metalscenen. Albummet er præget af en rå og energisk lyd, som er blevet et kendetegn for dem. Gennem deres karriere har Soulfly fortsat med at udvikle deres lyd og har udforsket forskellige temaer, lige fra personlige kampe og uligheder i samfundet til spirituelle og religiøse emner.
Bandet har oplevet flere line-up ændringer gennem årene, men Max Cavalera har været en konstant drivkraft og kreativ leder. Med albums som "Primitive" (2000), "Dark Ages" (2005) og "Ritual" (2018) har Soulfly bevist, at de kan forny sig selv og forblive relevante i en evigt skiftende musikscene. Deres koncerter er kendt for deres intense energi og interaktion med publikum, hvilket har sikret dem en loyal fanbase over hele verden.
Soulfly fortsætter med at være en betydningsfuld aktør inden for metalgenren, og Max Cavaleras vision om at skabe musik, der bryder grænser og udforsker nye territorier, lever videre gennem bandets vedvarende kreative indsats. Dette kan man blandt andet høre på bandets seneste album ’’Totem’’ fra 2022.
Gå ikke glip af en aften med ægte thrash metal og oplev Soulfly live i Pumpehuset 30. juli 2024

posts.title: Blonde Redhead
posts.body:
Indiepop legends give a concert in Copenhagen
Amerikanske Blonde Redhead gæster Pumpehuset den 13. august med numrene fra deres nye stærke album ”Sit Down for Dinner”. Supporten leveres af koreansk-danske Meejah.
For four decades, Blonde Redhead has cultivated their own unique expression somewhere between crackling noise rock, bittersweet indie pop and cinematic-melodramatic art pop, which has secured them a loyal and dedicated audience and a reputation as one of modern indie pop's most style-creating bands.
Blonde Redhead was formed in 1993 by singer, guitarist and keyboardist Kazu Makino and twin brothers Simone (drums and keys) and Amedeo Pace, who sings and plays guitar, bass and keyboards. At the beginning, they found musical inspiration in no wave rock and groups such as My Bloody Valentine and Fugazi, but very telling of their wide-ranging artistic vision, avant-garde filmmakers such as Jean-Luc Godard and Pier Paolo Pasolini were equally great sources of inspiration.
Up through the 90s they released four excellent albums (two of them via Sonic Youth drummer Steve Shelley's label Smells Like Records), but with 2000's masterful "Melody of Certain Damaged Lemons" they took an artistic quantum leap. Here, Blonde Redhead seriously abandons noise rock's bursting bursts to cultivate delicate songwriting instead, unfolding in a sophisticated and alluring art pop universe. A development they continued on the brilliant sequel “Misery Is a Butterfly” (2004); a beautiful, image-creating, chamber pop and gothic gloomy album with strings, synths and piano, which is considered one of the best indie pop albums of the 00s. In the following years, Blonde Redhead released the albums "23", "Penny Sparkle" and "Barragán", and as a special Danish curl, they provided the soundtrack for the Jørgen Leth tribute film "The Commentator". In 2017, the EP "3 O'Clock" was released, with which they toured, after which there was silence about the group for several years.
In 2022, however, they started playing live again, after which they released their tenth studio album "Sit Down for Dinner" in autumn 2023, which was well received by critics. Pitchfork, for example, gave it a grade of 7.5 and called it "their warmest, most welcoming music yet", while Mojo wrote that "Blonde Redhead address their potent heartaches with renewed grace and strength".
Blonde Redhead has previously given concerts in Aarhus and Copenhagen and performed several times at Roskilde Festival - most recently in 2018, where GAFFA awarded them with four solid stars. This summer they finally return when they perform the new tracks from "Sit Down for Dinner" and classics from the back catalog on 13 August in Pumpehuset.

posts.title: Cro-Mags
posts.body:
Hardcore punk legends occupy the Pumpehuset in August
With roots deeply rooted in New York City's motley punk scene, Cro-Mags have been pioneering hardcore punk for decades. Formed in 1981 by charismatic frontman Harley Flanagan, the band has cemented its reputation as one of the most influential groups in punk history.
With their signature sound, Cro-Mags have set the standard for what hardcore punk music can be. Their 1986 debut album, "The Age of Quarrel", stands as a monument to the band's raw talent and indomitable spirit. Still hailed as a classic of the genre, the album is an uncompromising display of punk's raw power and musical prowess.
But Cro-Mags is more than just music. Their lyrics, which often challenge society's norms and political status quo, have made them voices for a generation of marginalized and frustrated youth. Through their music, they manage to express the pain, anger and hope of those who feel neglected by society.
Even after decades on the scene, Cro-Mags continue to shape the punk landscape and inspire new generations of musicians and fans. Their legacy as pioneers in hardcore punk is indisputable, and their influence will continue to be felt for a long time to come. Cro-Mags is not just a band; they are a movement, an energy, an unadulterated manifestation of the indomitable spirit of punk.

posts.title: Avi Kaplan
posts.body:
Grammy-winning super singer visits Copenhagen with his beautiful folk songs
It's not every day you get to see a three-time Grammy winner live. But this autumn, concertgoers here at home have the opportunity when American Avi Kaplan gives a concert in Copenhagen.
From 2011-2017, Avi Kaplan was part of the vocal group Pentatonix, where his deep and expressive bass was a cornerstone of the band's success. They broke through after winning the a cappella singing competition/TV show "NBC's The Sing-Off", sold over six million albums and took home three Grammy Awards, including "Best Country Duo/Group Performance" for their cover of Dolly Parton's iconic "Jolene" - featuring Dolly herself! In 2017, Avi Kaplan left the successful project. He moved to Nashville and released the Nick Drake-inspired single "Fields and Piers" under the pseudonym Avriel & the Sequoias, which marked a completely new direction for his career.
On his own, Avi Kaplan thus cultivates a more searching and thoughtful expression, where classic American music traditions such as country, folk, bluegrass and soul are reinterpreted in intimate and sky-aspiring songs - always with Kaplan's expressive vocals at the center. His strong personal expression has both been compared to Fleet Foxes and the legend David Crosby.
After several years of work, Avi Kaplan's first album under his own name was released in the spring of 2022. "Floating on a Dream", as it was named, was produced by Shooter Jennings, who - in addition to having worked with e.g. Brandie Carlile, Duff McKagan and Marylin Manson – is also the son of outlaw country icon Waylon Jennings. The result is a beautiful, sensitive and evocative album that perfectly balances respect for America's deep musical heritage and melodically catchy modern songwriting. Avi Kaplan visited Denmark in 2020, where he performed to a packed Lille VEGA. Now he finally returns to our latitudes, and this time his Danish fans can look forward to two concerts: Tuesday, September 10 at Voxhall in Aarhus and the following day, September 11, at Pumpehuset in Copenhagen.

posts.title: Evergrey
posts.body:
Gothenburg's biggest progressive metal thugs are coming to Pumpehuset this autumn
After more than 30 years of progressive metal history, EVERGREY rises again with the release of their fourteenth studio album, "Theories of Emptiness", scheduled for release on June 7, 2024. This new chapter begins with the enchanting new single "Falling From the Sun", that combines heavy riffs with catchy choruses and hard-hitting melancholic lyrics, and serves as a follow-up to "Ominous" - cut from the group's worldwide top-selling latest album, "A Heartless Portrait (The Orphean Testament)".
Under the inimitable founder, singer and guitarist Tom S. Englund, EVERGREY has maintained a remarkable status, with appearances at the biggest festivals in the world, such as Wacken Open Air, Bloodstock, Summer Breeze and Graspop, and through thirteen studio albums. Each of these - mixing dark, emotional themes with complex progressive elements and melodic heavy metal - have earned them a reputation as pioneers of the genre and ensured their timeless imprint on metal.
Support: Cyhra

posts.title: Symphony X
posts.body:
The progressive power-metal band, Symphony X, will play in Pumpehuset on Thursday 19 September 2024
Symphony X is an American progressive, power-metal band, founded in 1994 by guitarist Michael Romeo.
Their 1997 album 'The Divine Wings of Tragedy' and their 2000 release 'V:The New Mythology Suite' have won them a place in the hearts of many fans of progressive metal. These albums also demonstrate the band's ability to create intricate musical soundscapes that take the listener on a journey through dark mythological worlds, philosophical concepts and emotional narratives. Symphony X has released a total of 9 albums, the latest, 'Underworld', from 2015.
Stylistically, they are on par with other prog-metal bands such as Dream Theater, Fates Warning and Pain of Salvation, but are just a little heavier. They play very syncopated and also have symphonic and neoclassical elements in the music in the style of Yngwie Malmsteen and Randy Rhoads.

posts.title: Skyggesiden
posts.body:
En af Danmarks mest fremadstormende rapper kickstarter sin efterårstour Pumpehuset til september med stærk support
SkyggeSiden er en fremadstormende rapper og sanger, der i 2021 debuterede som producer på det anmelderroste album, 'Skygge Siden 84'.
Hendes rap-stil er både hård og blid, når hun skifter mellem nutidig trap og 90'er-hiphop samtidig med, at hun blander omkvæd ind, der klinger af en soulet lyd. SkyggeSiden er en artist med en stor attitude og relevant lyrik, og hun er knivskarp live.
SkyggeSiden er snart album aktuel igen med udgivelsen ”Som Du Kender Det” hvorfra singlerne ”KonfliktSkygge” og  ”En Gang” er med til at sætte hende på hiphop-landkortet og sparke hendes nationale tour i gang i Pumpehuset til September.
SkyggeSiden optræder altid med den talentfulde DMC-vinder DJ KCL og sammen tager de samspillet med mellem DJ og rapper til nye højder.
Selvom SkyggeSiden har begejstret en evigt voksende tilhængerskare i flere år, har de sidste sæsoner vitterligt markeret hende som et uundgåeligt hjørneflag i genren.
SkyggeSiden venter ikke på nogen og asfalterer sin egen vej frem.

posts.title: Varg2TM
posts.body:
Varg²™ returns to Copenhagen in the company of local stars: Iron Sight & Pamela Angela
With his provocative style and formidable studio control, Varg²™ has become one of today's most significant producers. He first became known through Stockholm's Northern Electronics label, where his early releases combined misanthropy with techno. In 2016, he launched the Nordic Flora Series, which merged trap and EDM with ambient and electro-acoustic experiments. This led to the creation of his label, Cease 2 Exist, in 2020, where he explores the combination of hyperpop and trap. Varg²™ collaborates with both Sweden's rap elite such as Yung Lean and Bladee as well as international artists such as Eartheater and Skrillex.

posts.title: Left To Die + Incantation
posts.body:
A big metal night awaits when Left To Die and Incantation play Pumpehuset
It is mandatory to attend on 21 August 2024, because there is a meeting of death metal legends in the Pumphouse, when Incantation join forces with the supergroup Left To Die, which consists of current and former members of Death, Exhumed and Gruesome.

posts.title: Randall King
posts.body:
Randall King brings country music from Texas to Pumpehuset on August 20
The American country musician Randall King provides real honky-tonk atmosphere from West Texas when he plays in Copenhagen in August. With over 300 million streams on hits like "You In A Honky Tonk" and "Hey Cowgirl", King has maintained the authentic twang style of country music while gaining recognition for his deeply personal releases such as the EP "Leanna" from 2020 and the album "Shot Glass" from 2022. Drawing inspiration from legends such as Keith Whitley and George Strait, but also modernizing his sound with inspiration from Dierks Bentley and Gary Allan, King has cemented his place as one of today's most influential voices in traditional country. And with nearly 150 concerts annually worldwide, Randall King is constantly refining his performances and his craft.
The musician's latest release from January 2024, "Into the Neon", takes the honky-tonk genre to new heights, where classic roots meet modern sounds. Highly praised by Pandora, Country Now and Music Mayhem Magazine, the album explores King's unique creative vision and brings country music into a new era of infectious melodies and genuine twang.
Randall King says about the album: "You grow wiser with age, you grow wiser while you're working and experiencing life, and I feel like I have a deeper understanding of what my music really is. We're moving into the neon era of country music. The pendulum is swinging, and you're watching it happen... Now I just hope people get their mind blown.”

posts.title: 06 Boys
posts.body:
One of Norway's biggest boy bands is ready to charm its way into DK
With delicious hits like "Sprint", "Chili" and "Flax" + a new album, this summer of festivals will be the best yet as 06 Boys will tour some of the biggest festivals in 2024. Loud sing-alongs, above average impressive dance moves, emotional
saxophone solos and not least each other.
On the list of highlights, the guys have already sold out Rockefeller in Oslo, Havet in Trondheim, Driv in Tromsø, and then they have sold hundreds of tickets in Ålesund, Sogndal, Volda as well as Jugendfest, Høllafæst and Moldejazz. After an incredible journey from the boys' room in Molde to the coolest festivals around the country, 06 Boys will finally offer the biggest parties of their career!

posts.title: BODYSLAM! Wrestling
posts.body:
Experience the crazy atmosphere at Scandinavia's wildest wrestling show!
Wrestling is real, it's people who are fake! August 31st is BODYSLAM! back in Pumpehuset, where you are in the middle of a colossal Colosseum atmosphere, when there is beer on tap and action in the ring, ringside to Scandinavia's wildest wrestling show!
Entertainment violence from the very top shelf is a matter of course in the company of "Scandinavian Dragon" Aliss Ink, the superathlete Carlos Zamora, the party-happy Mokaï mates RandersPagne, "Sandheden" Peter Olisander and many more. The focal point of the evening is the prestigious annual tournament ScandiGraps Invitational, which brings out the absolute best in the usually hard-hitting and action-packed matches. As always seasoned with the cream of international guest performers, to complement the over-geared saga of all the BODYSLAM favourites. This time i.a. Emersyn Jayne and Bobby Gunns.
Wrestling is all its own, and BODYSLAM! has established itself as the foremost association within the pseudo-sport in Scandinavia. As the genre gains more and more traction in the cultural landscape. The big driver's license in øretæver wholesale comes to light when the exaggerated action and the caricatured characters go completely overboard in the hunt for gold and personal confrontations.
The doors open at 19 and we jump out from the top rope with the first match at 20.

posts.body:
Grammy-winning super singer visits Copenhagen with his beautiful folk songs

Hendes rap-stil er både hård og blid, når hun skifter mellem nutidig trap og 90'er-hiphop samtidig med, at hun blander omkvæd ind, der klinger af en soulet lyd. SkyggeSiden er en artist med en stor attitude og relevant lyrik, og hun er knivskarp live.
SkyggeSiden er snart album aktuel igen med udgivelsen ”Som Du Kender Det” hvorfra singlerne ”KonfliktSkygge” og  ”En Gang” er med til at sætte hende på hiphop-landkortet og sparke hendes nationale tour i gang i Pumpehuset til September.
SkyggeSiden optræder altid med den talentfulde DMC-vinder DJ KCL og sammen tager de samspillet med mellem DJ og rapper til nye højder.
Selvom SkyggeSiden har begejstret en evigt voksende tilhængerskare i flere år, har de sidste sæsoner vitterligt markeret hende som et uundgåeligt hjørneflag i genren.
SkyggeSiden venter ikke på nogen og asfalterer sin egen vej frem.

posts.title: Evergrey
posts.body:
Gothenburg's biggest progressive metal thugs are coming to Pumpehuset this autumn
After more than 30 years of progressive metal history, EVERGREY rises again with the release of their fourteenth studio album, "Theories of Emptiness", scheduled for release on June 7, 2024. This new chapter begins with the enchanting new single "Falling From the Sun", that combines heavy riffs with catchy choruses and hard-hitting melancholic lyrics, and serves as a follow-up to "Ominous" - cut from the group's worldwide top-selling latest album, "A Heartless Portrait (The Orphean Testament)".
Under the inimitable founder, singer and guitarist Tom S. Englund, EVERGREY has maintained a remarkable status, with appearances at the biggest festivals in the world, such as Wacken Open Air, Bloodstock, Summer Breeze and Graspop, and through thirteen studio albums. Each of these - mixing dark, emotional themes with complex progressive elements and melodic heavy metal - have earned them a reputation as pioneers of the genre and ensured their timeless imprint on metal.
Support: Cyhra

posts.title: Left To Die + Incantation
posts.body:
A big metal night awaits when Left To Die and Incantation play Pumpehuset
It is mandatory to attend on 21 August 2024, because there is a meeting of death metal legends in the Pumphouse, when Incantation join forces with the supergroup Left To Die, which consists of current and former members of Death, Exhumed and Gruesome.

posts.title: Randall King
posts.body:
Randall King brings country music from Texas to Pumpehuset on August 20
The American country musician Randall King provides real honky-tonk atmosphere from West Texas when he plays in Copenhagen in August. With over 300 million streams on hits like "You In A Honky Tonk" and "Hey Cowgirl", King has maintained the authentic twang style of country music while gaining recognition for his deeply personal releases such as the EP "Leanna" from 2020 and the album "Shot Glass" from 2022. Drawing inspiration from legends such as Keith Whitley and George Strait, but also modernizing his sound with inspiration from Dierks Bentley and Gary Allan, King has cemented his place as one of today's most influential voices in traditional country. And with nearly 150 concerts annually worldwide, Randall King is constantly refining his performances and his craft.
The musician's latest release from January 2024, "Into the Neon", takes the honky-tonk genre to new heights, where classic roots meet modern sounds. Highly praised by Pandora, Country Now and Music Mayhem Magazine, the album explores King's unique creative vision and brings country music into a new era of infectious melodies and genuine twang.
Randall King says about the album: "You grow wiser with age, you grow wiser while you're working and experiencing life, and I feel like I have a deeper understanding of what my music really is. We're moving into the neon era of country music. The pendulum is swinging, and you're watching it happen... Now I just hope people get their mind blown.”

posts.title: BODYSLAM! Wrestling
posts.body:
Experience the crazy atmosphere at Scandinavia's wildest wrestling show!
Wrestling is real, it's people who are fake! August 31st is BODYSLAM! back in Pumpehuset, where you are in the middle of a colossal Colosseum atmosphere, when there is beer on tap and action in the ring, ringside to Scandinavia's wildest wrestling show!
Entertainment violence from the very top shelf is a matter of course in the company of "Scandinavian Dragon" Aliss Ink, the superathlete Carlos Zamora, the party-happy Mokaï mates RandersPagne, "Sandheden" Peter Olisander and many more. The focal point of the evening is the prestigious annual tournament ScandiGraps Invitational, which brings out the absolute best in the usually hard-hitting and action-packed matches. As always seasoned with the cream of international guest performers, to complement the over-geared saga of all the BODYSLAM favourites. This time i.a. Emersyn Jayne and Bobby Gunns.
Wrestling is all its own, and BODYSLAM! has established itself as the foremost association within the pseudo-sport in Scandinavia. As the genre gains more and more traction in the cultural landscape. The big driver's license in øretæver wholesale comes to light when the exaggerated action and the caricatured characters go completely overboard in the hunt for gold and personal confrontations.
The doors open at 19 and we jump out from the top rope with the first match at 20.

posts.title: 06 Boys
posts.body:
One of Norway's biggest boy bands is ready to charm its way into DK
With delicious hits like "Sprint", "Chili" and "Flax" + a new album, this summer of festivals will be the best yet as 06 Boys will tour some of the biggest festivals in 2024. Loud sing-alongs, above average impressive dance moves, emotional
saxophone solos and not least each other.
On the list of highlights, the guys have already sold out Rockefeller in Oslo, Havet in Trondheim, Driv in Tromsø, and then they have sold hundreds of tickets in Ålesund, Sogndal, Volda as well as Jugendfest, Høllafæst and Moldejazz. After an incredible journey from the boys' room in Molde to the coolest festivals around the country, 06 Boys will finally offer the biggest parties of their career!

posts.title: Symphony X
posts.body:
The progressive power-metal band, Symphony X, will play in Pumpehuset on Thursday 19 September 2024
Symphony X is an American progressive, power-metal band, founded in 1994 by guitarist Michael Romeo.
Their 1997 album 'The Divine Wings of Tragedy' and their 2000 release 'V:The New Mythology Suite' have won them a place in the hearts of many fans of progressive metal. These albums also demonstrate the band's ability to create intricate musical soundscapes that take the listener on a journey through dark mythological worlds, philosophical concepts and emotional narratives. Symphony X has released a total of 9 albums, the latest, 'Underworld', from 2015.
Stylistically, they are on par with other prog-metal bands such as Dream Theater, Fates Warning and Pain of Salvation, but are just a little heavier. They play very syncopated and also have symphonic and neoclassical elements in the music in the style of Yngwie Malmsteen and Randy Rhoads.

posts.title: Avi Kaplan
posts.body:
Grammy-winning super singer visits Copenhagen with his beautiful folk songs
It's not every day you get to see a three-time Grammy winner live. But this autumn, concertgoers here at home have the opportunity when American Avi Kaplan gives a concert in Copenhagen.
From 2011-2017, Avi Kaplan was part of the vocal group Pentatonix, where his deep and expressive bass was a cornerstone of the band's success. They broke through after winning the a cappella singing competition/TV show "NBC's The Sing-Off", sold over six million albums and took home three Grammy Awards, including "Best Country Duo/Group Performance" for their cover of Dolly Parton's iconic "Jolene" - featuring Dolly herself! In 2017, Avi Kaplan left the successful project. He moved to Nashville and released the Nick Drake-inspired single "Fields and Piers" under the pseudonym Avriel & the Sequoias, which marked a completely new direction for his career.
On his own, Avi Kaplan thus cultivates a more searching and thoughtful expression, where classic American music traditions such as country, folk, bluegrass and soul are reinterpreted in intimate and sky-aspiring songs - always with Kaplan's expressive vocals at the center. His strong personal expression has both been compared to Fleet Foxes and the legend David Crosby.
After several years of work, Avi Kaplan's first album under his own name was released in the spring of 2022. "Floating on a Dream", as it was named, was produced by Shooter Jennings, who - in addition to having worked with e.g. Brandie Carlile, Duff McKagan and Marylin Manson – is also the son of outlaw country icon Waylon Jennings. The result is a beautiful, sensitive and evocative album that perfectly balances respect for America's deep musical heritage and melodically catchy modern songwriting. Avi Kaplan visited Denmark in 2020, where he performed to a packed Lille VEGA. Now he finally returns to our latitudes, and this time his Danish fans can look forward to two concerts: Tuesday, September 10 at Voxhall in Aarhus and the following day, September 11, at Pumpehuset in Copenhagen.

posts.title: Randall King
posts.body:
Randall King brings country music from Texas to Pumpehuset on August 20
The American country musician Randall King provides real honky-tonk atmosphere from West Texas when he plays in Copenhagen in August. With over 300 million streams on hits like "You In A Honky Tonk" and "Hey Cowgirl", King has maintained the authentic twang style of country music while gaining recognition for his deeply personal releases such as the EP "Leanna" from 2020 and the album "Shot Glass" from 2022. Drawing inspiration from legends such as Keith Whitley and George Strait, but also modernizing his sound with inspiration from Dierks Bentley and Gary Allan, King has cemented his place as one of today's most influential voices in traditional country. And with nearly 150 concerts annually worldwide, Randall King is constantly refining his performances and his craft.
The musician's latest release from January 2024, "Into the Neon", takes the honky-tonk genre to new heights, where classic roots meet modern sounds. Highly praised by Pandora, Country Now and Music Mayhem Magazine, the album explores King's unique creative vision and brings country music into a new era of infectious melodies and genuine twang.
Randall King says about the album: "You grow wiser with age, you grow wiser while you're working and experiencing life, and I feel like I have a deeper understanding of what my music really is. We're moving into the neon era of country music. The pendulum is swinging, and you're watching it happen... Now I just hope people get their mind blown.”

posts.title: Varg2TM
posts.body:
Varg²™ returns to Copenhagen in the company of local stars: Iron Sight & Pamela Angela
With his provocative style and formidable studio control, Varg²™ has become one of today's most significant producers. He first became known through Stockholm's Northern Electronics label, where his early releases combined misanthropy with techno. In 2016, he launched the Nordic Flora Series, which merged trap and EDM with ambient and electro-acoustic experiments. This led to the creation of his label, Cease 2 Exist, in 2020, where he explores the combination of hyperpop and trap. Varg²™ collaborates with both Sweden's rap elite such as Yung Lean and Bladee as well as international artists such as Eartheater and Skrillex.
